column2: Job Title: Business Development Manager Location: Domestic Hab Pharmaceuticals and Research Ltd Job Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Business Development Manager to join our team, specializing in contract manufacturing of pharmaceutical formulations. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry, with a strong background in business development and a proven track record of success. Responsibilities: 1. Identify and develop new business opportunities in the domestic market for contract manufacturing of pharmaceutical formulations. 2. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients to understand their needs and requirements. 3. Collaborate with internal teams including R&D, manufacturing, and regulatory affairs to develop customized solutions for clients. 4. Prepare and deliver compelling presentations and proposals to prospective clients. 5. Negotiate contracts and pricing agreements to ensure mutual benefit for both the company and the client. 6. Stay updated on industry trends, market dynamics, and competitor activities to identify potential threats and opportunities. 7. Monitor and track sales performance metrics to achieve and exceed targets. 8. Provide regular reports and updates to senior management on business development activities and outcomes. Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. MBA preferred. 2. Minimum of 5 years of experience in business development within the pharmaceutical industry, with a focus on contract manufacturing. 3. Proven track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets and objectives. 4. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. 5. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. 6. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. 7. Willingness to travel as required. Preferred Skills: 1. Experience working with regulatory requirements and quality standards in the pharmaceutical industry. 2. Knowledge of current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP) and other relevant regulations. 3. Familiarity with project management tools and techniques. 4. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software. Benefits: 1. Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. 2. Comprehensive health benefits package. 3. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement. 4. Dynamic and collaborative work environment. Application Instructions: Please submit your resume and cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this position to careers.habpharma.in. Only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.  We thank all applicants for their interest in joining our team.

column2: Sales Manager role is a new business generation from new customers and existing customers. He will do the first meeting with the customer. Present company profile, discuss requirement, share requirement, plan deadlines for second meeting with the management or close alone basis internal discussions. Interact with Sales coordination team, project management team build the feasibility of the business based on order size, customer profiling & expectations and order value etc.?    Role & responsibilities     He will be responsible to generate new business in an allocated territory. He will be responsible to meet annual targets of the company.?   He will be responsible to meet new clients, generate interest through effective presentations with product and software knowledge. He should be well versed with the dynamics of the business.    He will be responsible to maintain pipeline of potential business of the territory. He must maintain database of all customers visited by him of territory.?  He should be well versed with top competition companies of the territory.? He should suggest plans to counter the competition.?  He should independently evaluate the client need and suggest solutions independently.  He should have good people management skills and a good team player.?  He should think out of the box and plan initiatives in the territory independently.?  He should coordinate well within the departments, build cordial relationships within the departments and other HODs.   He will be responsible to collect payment or follow up for payments periodically.?  He should maintain all the customer interaction records for internal reviews.?  He will be travelling other cities as well to meet the customers.? Candidate Requirement: Experience on promote and sell Online Real Time water Quality analysers. Flow meters, Ph sensors, and other water analysers, online Real Time Emission and Air quality analysers, Gas Detectors will be preferred.  Experience required for the role at least 8 to 15 years.  He must be from techno sales background either from b2b sales or corporate sales. If he has done Govt sales will be an added advantage.?  He must be mobile, willing to travel to meet new and old customers. This is a job of 80% in the market and 20% in planning at office.?  Overall, we need a salesperson whose job is to meet new customers and generate business.?  He must have experience of managing the team. He must have people management skills also.?  Education: B.Tech in Electrical & electronics & communication or related field with sales background;   candidates from Environment or with experience in Online Instruments for Water, Emission, shall be preferred.  English and Hindi fluent communication desirable.  Interested candidates can share updated resumes at hr@vepolink.com along with below details: Total Experience Current Salary Expected Salary Current location -- Thanks & Regards Harsha Human Resources Manager

column2: Role: Senior Manager-Commercial Business( Europe ) Bangalore   About  Simplilearn Simplilearn, a Blackstone Group company, is the world's #1 online boot camp for digital skills training, focused on helping individuals, and business teams acquire the skills they need to thrive in the digital economy.  With more than 1,500 live online boot camps each month, we provide an engaging and outcome-oriented learning environment with live mentoring sessions, real-world projects, cloud-based labs, and 24/7 learner support. Our award-winning online boot camps are designed and updated by renowned industry and academic experts, covering the world's most sought-after digital skills, including Cyber Security, Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Blockchain, Project Management, Digital Marketing, and Data Science, among many others.  Through individual courses, comprehensive certification programs, and partnerships with world-renowned universities, we provide individuals and organizations with the job-ready skills they need to excel in their careers and achieve business goals. For more information visit -  https://www.simplilearn.com/business Job Description: Create and execute GTM plans for the Europe region. Handle the complete sales cycle from lead generation to opportunity creation to closure. Generate and handle product enquiries from all channels including inbound and outbound. Generate a 3x pipeline and meet monthly booking, revenue, and gross margin targets. Work with tools for sales cycle management and outbound efforts. Desired Skills: 7+ years of experience in sales, preferably in software product and services sales. Experience in selling into Europe markets.

column2: Project Role : Sales Origination Practitioner Project Role Description : Orchestrate and lead the entire origination process for a cross-client, cross service-group deal working with the CAL, the client team and relevant subject matter experts.  Must have skills : Sales Pursuit Management Good to have skills : Google Cloud Platform Architecture, Google Cloud Compute Services, IBM WebSphere Minimum  15  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE Summary :As a GCP Sales Origination specialist, you will be responsible for solution selling to customers in the US and European markets based on credible experience you have acquired through GCP design and deployments at your clients. Your typical day will involve identifying and owning sales opportunities, guiding solution architecture teams, and providing broad practitioner guidance to the team.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead sales origination for customers in the US and EMEA for opportunities in the design and deployment of the GCP platform (loadset migration, GCP native application deployments, AL/ML deployments) to clients, ensuring alignment with business goals and objectives. Own Sales origination, including proposal development, client presentations, and guidance to solution architecture teams. Provide technical guidance and leadership to the solution development team, to help them develop solutions using the GCP platform components. Lead sales origination based on experience acquired through professional services selling in the US and/or EMEA markets, design and implementation GCP platform, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, data scientists, and engineers, to ensure successful project launch. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Professional Services sales, GCP expertise, broad Data & AI Solution Architecture. Strong understanding of GCP technology components, including loadset migration, AI/ML, and cloud native deployments Experience with GCP and broad knowledge of other cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure. Experience with agile methodologies and project management tools, including Jira and Confluence. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 15 years of experience in platform provisioning, cloud native deployments and broad technology. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, data science, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful cloud solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE

column2: The Cloud Sales Specialist focuses on supporting the sale of cloud and managed services into prospective accounts. This solution areas Azure and AWS cloud supported by Meridian s services.          This individual will work closely with our US-based Account Managers to not only nurture existing customer relationships but to also forge new ones by championing our public cloud solutions.          A keen understanding of public cloud solutions, coupled with a relentless desire to identify and close opportunities is fundamental for this role.                                  Duties and Responsibilities                  Internal Evangelist to aggressively drive messaging internally and externally to Meridian customers;          Pre-sales to accounts, understanding client needs, articulating the value proposition of Cloud and Managed Services, and supporting salespeople to close business;          Document requirements, establish cloud service options, and present the solutions to customers;          Engages Senior Cloud Solution Architect on complex opportunities to develop solutions;          Demonstrate cloud services to clients;          Work with Account Managers to support the deal flow from opportunity identification, proposal presentation, and deal closing;          Work with the Meridian Project Management Office to coordinate service deployment and support plans;          Participate in training programs and pass certification exams;          Keep all systems (CRM, expense reporting, calendar) up to date and complete at all times;            Develop and create sales proposals for direct sales activities to existing accounts, as well as prospective accounts;                Share any developed materials and documentation which can be used by others as references or templates in support of the practice overall;          Provide professional timely and accurate updates on activities, in relevant IT systems, and keep sales leaders well informed;              Perform other duties as assigned.                  Qualifications Requirements                  Bachelor s Degree;          Overall Experience: A minimum of 10 years;          5+ years of working with Public Cloud solutions;          Knowledge of data backup, and disaster recovery a plus;          Proven Cloud and Services skills;          Multi-cloud experience - Microsoft Azure and/or AWS cloud services preferred;          Knowledge of cloud migration and modernization services, frameworks, and tools;          Awareness of cloud networking and cloud security best practices;          Strong analytical, problem solving, and conceptual skills;          Excellent customer relationship management skills;          Excellent English language skills, especially technical and business vocabulary;          Ability to write professional, articulate and compelling proposals;          Excellent presentation skills;          Proven ability to solve problems;          Highly motivated, self-driven, and results oriented;            Must be proactive and able to work with minimal supervision;              Ability to work on cross-functional teams;              Ability to work in pressure situations;              Occasional travel for training, client meetings and/or conferences.

column2: About Shopalyst : Shopalyst offers a Discovery Commerce platform for digital marketers. Combining data, AI and deep integrations with digital media and e-commerce platforms, Shopalyst connects people with products they love. More than 500 marquee brands leverage our SaaS platform for data driven marketing and sales in 30 countries across Asia, Europe and Americas. We have offices in Fremont CA, Bangalore, and Trivandrum. Our company is backed by Kalaari Capital. About the Role: Brand Solutions Specialist : - To support our fast-growing business in APAC, US & Europe, we are looking to expand our Business Development team. - This role is a mixture of sales and account management; nurturing, developing and expanding a portfolio of clients globally. This role will be based out of Bengaluru. column2: Sales Executive/Coordinator Job Description:  As a Sales Executive/Coordinator, you will be responsible for developing and implementing sales strategies to drive revenue growth and expand our client base within the publication industry. Your primary focus will be on selling our range of publications, including print and digital formats, to businesses and organizations within your assigned territory. Key responsibilities:     1.  Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with clients through regular communication, understanding their needs, and providing tailored solutions to meet their objectives. 2.  Sales Strategy:  Develop and execute effective sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and maximize sales opportunities. This includes conducting market research, identifying key trends, and staying informed about industry developments. 3.  Channel Distribution:  Identify and onboard channel distribution partners to expand the reach of our publications in the market. Work closely with distribution partners to ensure effective product placement, inventory management, and promotional activities. 4.  Retail Sales Optimization:  Develop and execute strategies to optimize sales performance at retail outlets. This includes implementing promotional campaigns, managing inventory levels, and ensuring effective product placement to maximize visibility and sales. 5.  Channel Development:  Identify and onboard retail partners to expand the distribution network of our publications. Build strong relationships with retail decision-makers and negotiate favorable terms for product placement and promotion. 6.  Product Knowledge:  Gain a deep understanding of our publications, including their content, features, and benefits, in order to effectively articulate value propositions to clients and address any inquiries or objections they may have. 7.  Negotiation and Closing:  Negotiate terms and pricing agreements with vendors to secure sales contracts and achieve mutually beneficial outcomes. Close sales deals in a timely manner while adhering to company policies and procedures. 8.  Sales Reporting : Provide regular reports and updates to management on sales performance, market trends, and competitive activities. 9.  Collaboration:  Collaborate closely with internal teams, including editorial, marketing, and production, to ensure seamless execution of client campaigns and projects. Act as a liaison between clients and internal stakeholders to facilitate effective communication and project management. 10.  Industry Networking:  Attend industry events, conferences, and trade shows to network with potential clients, stay abreast of industry trends, and represent the company's brand and publications. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in business administration, Marketing, Communications, or related field. Proven track record of success in B2B sales, preferably within the publication industry. Strong sales acumen with the ability to identify opportunities, negotiate contracts, and close deals. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. Self-motivated with a results-driven approach and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team Knowledge of the publication industry, including market trends, competitor analysis, and emerging technologies. Willingness to travel within the assigned territory as needed.

column2: We are looking for a passionate, curious & driven GSI Alliance Manager to join us in Bangalore.      We are looking for a stellar GSI Alliance Manager to join our team in Bengaluru, India.      The position will work with the partner(s) to own all activities required at different stages within the Alliance relationship.      We are looking for world-class candidates to develop relationships and manage the success of Global System Integrator(GSI).      The alliance manager will play a pivotal role in managing strategic relationships with our GSI to help them grow their business globally, whilst driving C-level, Practice Team, Marketing and Field relationships.      The ideal candidate will bring a partner background that enables them to drive successful partnerships and engage at the CXO level.      The position also requires a strong product acumen, complex campaign understanding, and working knowledge of the Enterprise IT landscape.          Responsibilities:          Develop the global plan for the alliance partner in collaboration with stakeholders across the organization with a focus on key offerings and country-level execution.      Develop joint relationships, initiatives, and programs for long-term sustained account success.      Anchor the GSI recruitment, constant enablement and end-to-end partner engagement.      Influences Sales leadership to partner for short and long-term revenue growth, while at the same time, building sustainable, trusting relationships across the Alliance partner      Aligns closely with the regional alliance leaders to ensure the identification, pursuit, closure, and tracking of customer opportunities to perpetuate the existing base of organization revenue - engage in customer-specific activities as needed      Identifying the right opportunities, framing deal structures, negotiating & closing out of deals with a focus on business development and sourcing deals.      Ensure Practice Services Lines and Solution Centers are fully trained on the Whatfix platform and value prop so they are positioned to evangelize Whatfix with their regional sales teams and clients.      Manage and collaborate with GSI partner to define and execute joint sales and Go to Market (GTM) programs      Propose business solutions in support of sales campaigns and serve as the domain expert of proposed solutions to prospective clients.      Assist the partner team with the expansion strategy into target accounts by educating them on WhatFix s overall capability      Plan sales campaigns in conjunction with partner executives and lead efforts to ensure the delivery of all technical resources into the sales campaigns of our partner.      Collaborate with partner s product managers, software developers, analysts, industry principals and other groups evangelizing and enabling them on WhatFix      Handle escalation & governance as part of partner program and experience during sales as well as after-sales          Requirements:          MBA Degree or equivalent business experience      5-7 years of GSI alliance experience preferably from within a SaaS/ISV organization      Ability to understand complex GSI relationships      Experience driving partner go-to-market campaigns that include cross-functional teams across sales, marketing, and partners      Experience engaging and influencing C-level executives      Experience owning, driving and managing partnerships against quarterly targets      Excellent communicator and active listener with a strong sense of ownership in the work      Skilled in negotiating contracts and growth plans with current and prospective GSI partners      Ability to understand and apply procedures, regulations, and policies related to areas of specialized expertise      Ability to use a clearly defined methodology for establishing priorities      Ability to proactively develop partner relationships by listening to, understanding anticipating, and providing solutions to partner and partners customer needs          What you will get to do:          Be a trailblazer in a new platform category      Help brands solve critical business challenges that impact their P&L      Full accountability for your growth and business outcomes      Learn and have fun      Work with some of the best talents from Silicon Valley and India

column2: Are you ready to use your software knowledge and customer support savvy skills?  If so, read on and apply today! As a HubSpot Specialist, you will be responsible for completing HubSpot projects, ensuring client satisfaction, and effectively managing HubSpot for our clients. Your expertise in HubSpot and inbound marketing strategies will be pivotal in driving immediate and sustained marketing success for our clients. As a HubSpot Specialist, you'll be entrusted with the following key responsibilities: HubSpot Implementation: Successfully implement HubSpot CRM, Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, Service Hub, and any other relevant HubSpot tools according to client requirements. Customization and Configuration: Customize and configure HubSpot modules, workflows, email templates, forms, landing pages, and other features to meet specific business needs. Integration Management: Manage integration between HubSpot and other systems such as Salesforce, ERP systems, e-commerce platforms, and customer service tools, ensuring seamless data flow. Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and optimize marketing campaigns using HubSpot tools, including email marketing, social media, content marketing, and lead nurturing campaigns. Sales Enablement: Enable sales teams with HubSpot Sales Hub tools, including CRM management, pipeline tracking, email tracking, and automation of sales processes to improve efficiency and effectiveness. Customer Support and Training: Provide ongoing support and training to internal teams and clients on how to use HubSpot effectively, troubleshoot issues, and ensure user adoption. Analytics and Reporting: Analyze performance metrics and key performance indicators (KPIs) using HubSpot reporting tools, providing insights and recommendations for improving marketing and sales effectiveness. Client Relationship Management: Build and nurture strong relationships with key clients utilizing HubSpot. Understand clients' business goals, challenges, and objectives to align HubSpot solutions accordingly. Act as the main point of contact for all communication between the company and key clients. Strategic Account Management: Develop and implement strategic account plans to ensure client retention and growth. Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities within existing client accounts. Collaborate with the sales team to drive new business from existing clients. Support and Issue Resolution: Offer ongoing support to address any issues, questions, or concerns raised by clients. Work closely with the customer support team to resolve technical challenges promptly. Performance Monitoring and Reporting : Monitor and analyze clients' usage and performance metrics within HubSpot. Provide regular reports and insights to clients on the impact of HubSpot on their business. Proactively identify areas for improvement and optimization. Core Competencies Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. Possess 3-5 years of experience in client-facing roles, preferably as an Account Manager. Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients. Proficiency in utilizing HubSpot CRM and marketing automation tools. Strong analytical skills to interpret data and make informed decisions. Ability to troubleshoot and solve problems effectively. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve objectives. Why CEDCOSS? CEDCOSS  stands tall as a vanguard of innovation, an aggregator of possibilities, and an enabler of technological prowess. Our expert team under the roof of CEDCOSS is a collective force dedicated to delivering cutting-edge products that redefine industry standards. Specializing in e-commerce development, mobile app development, progressive web apps, API integration, CRM and ERP development, cloud architecture, DevOps, AWS-SaaS development, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Virtual Intelligence, Chatbots, and Cross-Platform Development Tools, we craft comprehensive products that serve as the technical backbone for online ventures. Our impact extends globally, catering to a diverse clientele that includes big tech companies, MSMEs, and ambitious entrepreneurs. As partners, we stride alongside Fortune 500 organizations and Global 2000 enterprises, forging alliances with tech giants such as Google, Meta, and Amazon.  In the realm of digital transformation, CEDCOSS isn't just a digital product creator; we are architects of digital excellence.  And the PERKS | The good stuff you get for working hard Flexible working for a better work-life balance The five-day workweek for more time off A plethora of industry exposure and self-growth opportunities JOIN US to maximize your impact on strategy and performance.

column2: Job Title: Online Sales Specialist (B2B) Overview:  As an Online Sales Specialist focusing on Business-to-Business (B2B) transactions, you will be responsible for driving online sales and revenue growth within the Edtech and Service Industry sectors, particularly in the Tech Services niche. Leveraging your expertise in online marketing, especially on platforms like LinkedIn, you will play a pivotal role in developing and implementing strategies to engage potential clients, generate leads, and convert them into loyal customers. This role demands a deep understanding of the Edtech landscape and a passion for delivering exceptional service solutions to clients in the technology sector. Responsibilities: Online Marketing Strategy:  Develop and execute comprehensive online marketing strategies tailored to target B2B clients in the Edtech and Service Industry sectors, with a focus on LinkedIn Marketing. Lead Generation:  Identify and pursue potential clients through proactive outreach, networking, and leveraging online platforms to generate qualified leads. Client Engagement:  Build and nurture relationships with prospective clients through effective communication and engagement strategies, showcasing the value proposition of our services. Sales Conversion:  Drive the conversion of leads into sales by understanding client needs, presenting suitable service solutions, and negotiating terms to secure contracts. Market Research:  Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics to inform sales and marketing strategies and identify new business opportunities. Collaboration:  Work closely with cross-functional teams including Marketing, Product Development, and Customer Service to ensure alignment and optimize the overall customer experience. Performance Tracking:  Monitor and analyze key performance metrics related to sales, lead generation, and client engagement to assess the effectiveness of strategies and make data-driven recommendations for improvement. Requirements: Experience:  Minimum of 2 years of experience in online sales, with a proven track record of success in B2B environments, preferably within the Edtech or Service Industry sectors. Online Marketing Expertise:  Proficiency in online marketing strategies, particularly in leveraging LinkedIn and other digital platforms to drive B2B sales and lead generation. Industry Knowledge:  Strong understanding of the Edtech landscape and familiarity with the Service Industry, particularly in the context of technology services. Communication Skills:  Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex concepts clearly and persuasively to diverse audiences. Negotiation Skills:  Demonstrated ability to negotiate effectively and close sales deals, with a focus on building mutually beneficial partnerships. Analytical Skills:  Strong analytical capabilities with the ability to interpret data, track performance metrics, and derive actionable insights to optimize sales and marketing strategies. Adaptability:  Agility to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, and willingness to adapt to evolving market trends and business priorities. Bachelor's Degree:  Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field preferred. Interested one can share their resumes along with cover Letter at pooja@vdimentics.com

column2: Position:  Inside Sales Manager   Job Type:  Full-Time   Location:  Mumbai  Responsibilities:    Lead Qualification and Customer Segmentation:   Since it's an inside sales role,  you'll be given inbound high-intent leads . You will be responsible for qualifying the incoming leads and segmenting them into the right funnel based on their business profile.  Consultative Sales and Use-Case Analysis:  We have a hands-on consultative sales process, which means your core KRA will involve in understanding how businesses currently operate, their pain points, and how our tech enablement suite can help them.  Take and Achieve Revenue Targets:  Achieve revenue and conversion targets and set up benchmarks with uncapped incentives ranging from  Rs 10k/month to Rs 2 Lacs/month (on average). Product Demonstrations:  Conduct group demos, curated 1-on-1 product demonstrations, and consultative webinars or physical sessions to help customers understand the product and how it'll add value to their business. Building Scalable Processes:  You'll be involved in setting up and refining sales processes across multiple 0 to 1s, establishing benchmarks for inputs and outputs. Product Development:  Intelligently absorb all the key requirements/pain points of the users regarding what developments the user wants in the product. This will allow us to improve the stickiness of our solutions in the customers business and communicate the information to the product team for nurturing the product. Retention and Success:  Ensure that customers are actively using our platform on an ongoing basis and build a strategy for proactively taking action to re-engage with customers. Upselling & Cross-selling:  Develop strategies around upselling and cross-selling relevant offerings and solutions to customers based on their persona and their use-cases through a consultative sales approach. Optimize Key Metrics (Conversion Rates, Average Revenue per customer, Annual Recurring Revenue, etc):   Take part in achieving the best and benchmarking key metrics that define the holistic growth of both the organization and the individual.   You're the best fit if you have: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Sales, Marketing, or related field Experience in SaaS or Conversational Commerce space of more than 1 - 2 years Proven experience in building and maintaining relationships with customers  Experience in managing a team and meeting targets Ability to develop effective sales strategies and implement them successfully. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills (both English and Hindi). Strong customer service skills and a customer-focused mindset. Good camera presence and public speaking skills. A liking for talking to people. There is no hard selling in this job. Your role is to come across as smart and friendly to potential businesses (customers) so that they can trust you to help them achieve their business goals through consultative sales. Tech-savviness and the ability to figure out your way around technology yourself. If you feel that technology is something that you just "get" and you are passionate about it, then this role is for you. A family business background, or involvement in the same in some capacity, or a natural inclination towards business. A strong understanding of the sales process, experience with customer satisfaction, the ability to analyze and interpret sales data, and experience with CRM tools is a plus. An ownership mindset to proactively take initiatives and accomplish tasks.   Why Join Quicksell? - Excellent incentive policy:   We offer the best-in-class incentives for the hard work you put in!  An excellent Inside Sales Manager can earn up to the monthly CTC or even 2x of the monthly CTC on achieving monthly targets as incentives. - Empowering Individual Expression:  We foster an environment where individuals freely take initiatives and express themselves. - Working closely with WhatsApp/Meta in empowering Global Businesses  on revolutionizing customer engagement and commerce on the worlds highest engagement and attention communication platform, WhatsApp. - Unbeatable learning curve and first-hand experience of how SaaS org are built and scaled  - The Indian software as a service (SaaS) market is expected to grow from $13 billion in 2022 to $25 billion by 2025, $35 billion by 2027, and $50 billion by 2030, according to a report by venture capital firm Bessemer Venture Partners (BVP). - Direct exposure to Conversational AI /Conversational Commerce, Chatbots, Automation, and WhatsApp Commerce landscape. - Open-Door Policy:  You can walk up to anyone in the team, and your insights and suggestions will be highly valued. - Ultimate exposure to how global small, medium, and large businesses operate:  The job role organically involves understanding the business of potential customers at length, giving you insight into how businesses across industries like retail, ed-tech, D2C, hospitality, automobile, jewellery, and 80+ other industries function.
column11: Consultative Sales, Software Sales, CRM Sales, Saas Sales, IT Sales, Software Solution Sales

column2: Sales Managers/ Executives_ Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company for Karnataka, Tamilnadu    Should have experience in Rotavator, rotavator blades or intercultivator sales.   Comfortable to travel 18 days in a month for tours   If you are from Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company For , Please call us @ 7092689999 Or email your CV to jagannaath@kamms.net   Position Name: Sales Managers/ Sales Executives Position Type: Full time Job Location: Maharashtra - Pune/ Kolhapur, Aurangabad, Mumbai Suburbs (Base location can be anywhere in the respective states and we are hiring 2 candidates for each state)   We are on a mission to bring Farm Mechanization to every farm and to every farmer. We are Indias first Farm Mechanization B2B Marketplace, Knowledge-building platform and Supply Chain Solutions.   We cover all Agri Tools & Spares supporting the Entire Farming Cycle (Seedbed preparation, Sowing & plantation, Plant Cultivation, Harvesting and Threshing) We have the largest assortment of spare parts across the industry at one place. We provide spares of all machines and across all categories.  We hosts the most extensive and robust network of vendors across the agriculture sector in India. We partner with verified OEM and OES to provide quality spares at the fastest turnaround time  Position Roles and Responsibilities   We are looking for high-performing Sales Executives with experience in rural sales and marketing. You will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential, travel to different places for dealer development, product demonstrations, customer support etc. The candidate must be familiar with agriculture machineries and rural market and should be comfortable to travel.  Responsibilities include:  1. Develop and execute on a sales plan for the assigned territory  2. Ability to build a team, train them and manage their performance in line with the planned targets   3. Identify new dealers & visiting dealers regularly to build a strong relationship and grow revenues  4. Demonstrate knowledge of after sales product issues and spare parts for various agricultural equipment   5. Develop business intelligence on various types of Agri equipment and technology selling in the market; on new products being launched and on prospects.  6. Understand crop seasons and farmer requirements in the respective territory.   7. Promote, handhold & convert dealers to digital approaches of doing business   8. Regular reporting on activities & developments in your territory to the assigned manager   9. Adhering to timelines and commitment for business development activities, sales & assigned tasks and inculcate an execution oriented culture into your team.  10. Have a keen eye for detail in every aspect of work / task assigned by the company. Travel:  Extensive travel is required for dealer visits/meet, product demonstrations for this position.  Qualification:  BBA or MBA in Sales/Marketing (with rural focus), or BE/BTech in Mechanical/Automotive Engineering Experience:  minimum 8 years of experience is required. Those who are meeting the our requirement criteria and can join asap, Please share CVs to jagannaath@kamms.net or whatsapp to 7092689999

column2: Job   Title:  Sales Team Lead Company   Name:  Sparklehood Location:  Delhi, NCR Department:  Sales and Business Development Employment   Type:  Full-Time, Onroll Position   Overview: We're looking for an experienced and dynamic Sales Team Lead to supervise and direct our sales representatives in specified territories. The ideal candidate should possess a solid background in the Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) sector, with a minimum of 3 years of relevant experience. An MBA in Marketing would be advantageous. Key   Responsibilities: Sales Team Management:  Supervise, mentor, and lead a team of sales representatives within assigned territories.  Set sales targets, goals, and objectives for the team and ensure their effective implementation.  Provide ongoing coaching, training, and performance feedback to improve the sales team's effectiveness and productivity. Territory Management:  Develop and implement strategic plans to maximize sales and market penetration within designated territories.  Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to identify opportunities for growth.  Ensure proper coverage of assigned territories and optimize route planning for sales representatives. Account Management:  Manage and optimize the performance and revenue of clients/customers on a recurring weekly basis. Customer Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong relationships with key customers, distributors, and retailers within the assigned territories.  Address customer inquiries, complaints, and issues in a timely and effective manner to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty. Sales Strategy Development:  Collaborate with senior management to develop sales strategies, pricing policies, and promotional activities to drive revenue growth.  Analyze sales data and market insights to identify areas for improvement and develop action plans accordingly. Performance Monitoring and Reporting:  Track and monitor sales performance metrics, including sales targets, revenue, market share, and profitability.  Prepare and present regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and competitive analysis to senior management. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.  Proven experience in sales management, preferably in a leadership role.  Strong leadership and team-building skills.  Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.  Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and market trends. Compensation:  Upto 15 Lacs (Fixed+Variable) Benefits:  Traveling allowances  Opportunities for career advancement  Employee recognition  Dynamic and collaborative work environment Interview   Process: 1. column2: About Info Edge India Ltd     Info Edge is Indias leading consumer internet company known for its strong brands in recruitment (naukri.com, naukrigulf.com, iimjobs.com, firstnaukri.com), real estate (99acres.com), matrimony (Jeevansathi.com) and education (shiksha.com).   Starting with a classified recruitment online business, naukri.com, the Company has grown and diversified rapidly, setting benchmarks as a pioneer for others to follow either through setting up of in-house brands or through the route of strategic investments and acquisitions. Zomato.com, policybazaar.com & Happily Unmarried Marketing Private Limited are our investee companies to name a few out of many. With years of experience in the domain, strong cash flow generation and a diversified business portfolio, Info Edge is one of the very few profitable pure play internet companies in the country.   These are exciting times for Info Edge as we continue to grow in all our businesses, and continue to scale newer heights. We are investing across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to increase our predictive powers on customer behavior and continuously optimize and improve our systems.   At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. Driven by innovation, an experienced and talented leadership team and a strong entrepreneurial orientation, we pride ourselves on having a culture that promotes meritocracy. Our numerous milestones can largely be credited to an incredibly smart team working in an environment that encourages creativity and going the extra mile to develop products that people love to use and add value to our clients.   About BU: Naukri.com   Naukri.com, online recruitment classifieds, is a significant player and a market leader in Indias well-established business space. The recruitment space provides all the job seeker with advisory services and caters to different elements of the job listing, employer branding, resume short-listing, career site management and campus recruitment. With over 67 Million resumes searches daily, Naukri.com has 5 Million job listings, 59 Thousand+ unique clients and 4.9 Million recruiters connect with the job seekers via emails.   The platform, on the online recruitment space, continues to reinforce its established leadership position in India that has given it a competitive edge in the market.          Educational Qualification:  MBA in Marketing/International Business Desired Experience:  1-3 years   Job Objective:  The objective of this role is to enhance our client base by acquiring new business and renewal for our online recruitment solutions.   Job Description:   New Client Acquisition:  Accelerate customer adoption through well-developed sales engagements and successful Go To Market Strategy Business Renewal : Achieve sales targets by growing business from existing clients through renewal ,upselling and cross selling.  Lead Generation : Develop a database of qualified leads through referrals, digital media, canvassing and cold calling. Client Service & Engagement : Strategizing and implementing recruitment campaigns and actively engaging with the customers by monitoring product delivery, demonstrations and trainings. Closure and Collection : Manage Prospects, negotiate and freeze on commercials taking them to a logical closure with required documentation and ensure timely collection. Consultative Sales Approach : Develop an in depth understanding of the client?? business and their needs and propose customized recruitment solutions. Collaborate with various internal and external teams to deliver the best customer experience, monitor product performance and ROI and share necessary analytics with relevant stakeholders.    Required Skills:   Exceptional communication and presentation skills. 1-3 years of corporate sales, B2B experience. column2: The growth team is a critical piece of Apnas growth story so far. The team has played a key role in Apnas growth journey to become a clear market leader in the space within 18 months of product launch overtaking multiple incumbent players. This has been achieved by managing thefunnel of SMB leads in the market, targeting the right clients, & ensuring their timely onboarding. We are adding new members to the team to augment our existing capabilities and help chart Apna?? next phase of rapid growth. About the Role We are looking for a BDE to carry out hunting activities in the market for acquiring SMBcustomers, driving the cold calling of clients, and closing long-term deals on the ground. Incentives: Yes Responsibilities   ?? Visiting 7-8 clients daily to pitch them Apna?? hiring products ?? Generate prospects and share with your manager all data pertaining to market ?? Manage objection handling of customers with respect to product, competition, pricing & expectations. ?? Selling recruitment solutions to SMB clients by assessing their business requirements. ?? Manage onboarding of clients and them posting their first job on the platform ?? Create references in the market and drive organic revenue ?? Be a representative of the Apna brand and effectively pitch our value proposition to suitable and interested prospects ?? Work on weekly / monthly targets and ensure adherence to short and long-term goals of the growth ?? Create brand visibility of Apna in the market by handing out collaterals & building references Requirements  Skillsets: Hustler, Street Smart, Negotiation, Lead generation (cold calling + physical), Knocking ?? Bike and DL mandatory.  Team player and a strong people person.  Ready to do extensive travelling. Perks of working at Apna ??Supportive top management and employee-centric work policies ??Be part of the largest sociographic change in India by solving three of the biggest problems for blue-collar workers: Lack of influence, Lack of opportunity, and Lack of skill Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: About Info Edge India Ltd     Info Edge is Indias leading consumer internet company known for its strong brands in recruitment (naukri.com, naukrigulf.com, iimjobs.com, firstnaukri.com), real estate (99acres.com), matrimony (Jeevansathi.com) and education (shiksha.com).   Starting with a classified recruitment online business, naukri.com, the Company has grown and diversified rapidly, setting benchmarks as a pioneer for others to follow either through setting up of in-house brands or through the route of strategic investments and acquisitions. Zomato.com, policybazaar.com & Happily Unmarried Marketing Private Limited are our investee companies to name a few out of many. With years of experience in the domain, strong cash flow generation and a diversified business portfolio, Info Edge is one of the very few profitable pure play internet companies in the country.   These are exciting times for Info Edge as we continue to grow in all our businesses, and continue to scale newer heights. We are investing across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to increase our predictive powers on customer behavior and continuously optimize and improve our systems.   At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. Driven by innovation, an experienced and talented leadership team and a strong entrepreneurial orientation, we pride ourselves on having a culture that promotes meritocracy. Our numerous milestones can largely be credited to an incredibly smart team working in an environment that encourages creativity and going the extra mile to develop products that people love to use and add value to our clients.   About BU: Naukri.com   Naukri.com, online recruitment classifieds, is a significant player and a market leader in Indias well-established business space. The recruitment space provides all the job seeker with advisory services and caters to different elements of the job listing, employer branding, resume short-listing, career site management and campus recruitment. With over 67 Million resumes searches daily, Naukri.com has 5 Million job listings, 59 Thousand+ unique clients and 4.9 Million recruiters connect with the job seekers via emails.   The platform, on the online recruitment space, continues to reinforce its established leadership position in India that has given it a competitive edge in the market.          Educational Qualification:  MBA in Marketing/International Business Desired Experience: 0 -3 years   Job Objective:  The objective of this role is to enhance our client base by acquiring new business and renewal for our online recruitment solutions.   Job Description:   New Client Acquisition:  Accelerate customer adoption through well-developed sales engagements and successful Go To Market Strategy Business Renewal : Achieve sales targets by growing business from existing clients through renewal ,upselling and cross selling.  Lead Generation : Develop a database of qualified leads through referrals, digital media, canvassing and cold calling. Client Service & Engagement : Strategizing and implementing recruitment campaigns and actively engaging with the customers by monitoring product delivery, demonstrations and trainings. Closure and Collection : Manage Prospects, negotiate and freeze on commercials taking them to a logical closure with required documentation and ensure timely collection. Consultative Sales Approach : Develop an in depth understanding of the clients business and their needs and propose customized recruitment solutions. Collaborate with various internal and external teams to deliver the best customer experience, monitor product performance and ROI and share necessary analytics with relevant stakeholders.    Required Skills:   Exceptional communication and presentation skills. 0-3 years of corporate sales, B2B experience. Outstanding customer relationship management experience and collaboration skills   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

column2: Role & responsibilities     Summary / Position Purpose:  As a remote Field Sales Representative, you are responsible for introducing and selling high-quality, innovative products to current and potential business customers by telephone. Using the existing database, the Field Sales Representative initiates the first call to potential customers and supports them through the purchasing process for their first order. Additionally, Field Sales Representatives are focused on excellent customer service and support active client accounts expanding the number of products existing customers have in their stores.  Essential Duties, Functions and/or Responsibilities:  Field Sales Representatives are full-time, telephone sales rep employees  Make a minimum of 8-12 outgoing phone contacts per hour to the Customers identified through the database  Approximately 80% of your time will be dedicated to calling customers, while 20% will be administrative in nature (entering orders into Salesforce, running reports, etc.)  Document each call in Salesforce in order to maintain accurate records for future contacts made to the customer  Achieve weekly and monthly sales, call volume, and new customer acquisition goals  Follow scripting to introduce the product to potential customers over the phone.  Utilize Salesforce and Great Plains to track orders and communicate expected delivery timelines to customers.  Ensure accurate customer information, including billing details, in Salesforce. Update customer information when needed.  Process returns when necessary in accordance with the returns policy and process.  Participate in ongoing training to enhance sales pitch for new and existing customers.  Communicate with customers over the phone and by email when appropriate to ensure excellent customer service and communication.  Develop a strong knowledge of the companys products and services in order to facilitate the sales process.  Maintains a strong work ethic and ability to meet tight deadlines  Education, Attributes, and/or Work Experience Requirements:  HS Diploma, Bachelor?? Degree preferred  2+ years of over-the-phone customer service and/or inside sales experience preferred  Excellent analytical, decision-making, and organizational skills  An engaging, outgoing personality and passion for helping customers.  Must have outstanding communication skills, specifically verbal communication  Ability to safely and successfully perform the essential job functions consistent with the ADA, FMLA and other federal, state and local standards, including meeting qualitative and/or quantitative productivity standards.  Ability to maintain regular, punctual attendance consistent with the ADA, FMLA and other federal, state and local standards  Ability to communicate verbally over the phone and navigate on a computer

column2: Job Description- Job Title: Account Executive - Inside Sales Job Location: Bangalore / Vadodara (Onsite) Shift: US Shift [5:30 pm - 2:30 am] Collabera is looking for an  Account executive - Inside sales ?who can cultivate opportunities for the development of the business and plans strategies to target potential clients and customers. Inside sales Team is the cornerstone of any successful organization because they ultimately generate new revenue by getting client business referrals, network, and web leads and Provide prospective customers/clients with all services offered, and additional presentations as needed. Therefore, they need to upgrade themselves regularly with current industry trends and maintain good relations with potential business entrepreneurs. What You'll Do Responsible for coordinating activities related to?sales?and customer service on clients' accounts. Identifying, qualifying, and securing business opportunities Creating a?sales?pipeline while working on pre-identified accounts Setting up meetings with US-based clients via calls and Emails Acknowledge incoming telephone calls, emails, letters, and messages, and pass it to the?sales?representative or account manager to provide a detailed response. Building business relationships with current and potential clients Collaborating with clients in the US to secure, retain, and grow accounts. Doing extensive Market Research on all potential clients Developing customized targeted?sales?strategies Coordinating business generation activities Answering potential client questions and follow-up call questions. Meeting or exceeding annual?sales?goals. Collaborating with management on?sales?goals, planning, and forecasting What Youll Need Comfortable making calls and talking to new people all-day. Excellent verbal and written communication skills; the ability to call, connect and interact with clients. Persuasive and goal-oriented Possesses an energetic, outgoing, and friendly demeanour. Eager to expand the company with new?sales, clients, and territories. Self-motivated and self-directed Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently. In-depth understanding of company services and their position in the industry Able to work accurately under stress and pressure to meet competing deadlines. Excellent analytical and time-management skills Tenacity to handle rejection and continue with a positive attitude when reaching the next potential client. Ability to work independently or as an active member of a team. Strong computer skills, including Microsoft Office Suite (Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel) Bonus Points If Experience with lead generation and prospect management Cold calling experience; Previous experience as an?inside?sales?representative, or related?sales?experience Able to communicate with C-Level Executives professionally. To apply, share your updated resume with me as a response to this email along with a preferred time to get on a call.? Looking forward to hearing from you!?

column2: A.   Key Responsibility Areas (KRAs): The Franchise Dealer Associate will be mapped to a dealer, and hence his main job is  secondary sales, lead conversion & contractor activation . 1.   Business outcome:  Sales value and special products turnover through franchise dealer counter.  2.   Lead Conversion:  Would focus on lead conversion for painting services for the central, dealer and self leads. 3.   Enrolment:  To enroll the painters and contractors in the Sparkle Loyalty Program. 4.   Activation:  The painters and contractors need to be contacted on a regular basis so that they are kept active in the system.  5.   Display:  Responsible for maintaining the planogram & display at the shop for franchise counters.  6.   Meets:  Painter/contractor shop meetings along with TSM/TSE.  B.   Tasks to be taken up by him/her:   1.   Product Sales:  Product sale turnover through franchise dealer counter has to be ensured by the franchise dealer associate. 2.   Special Product sales:  Special product sale turnover through franchise dealer counter has to be ensured by the franchise dealer associate. 3.   Lead Generation:  geographical scanning, dealer/contractor connect 4.   Lead Conversion:  Would focus on lead conversion for painting services for the central and dealer leads.  5.   Enrolment:  To enroll the painters and contractors in the Sparkle Loyalty Program. 6.   Activation:  The painters and contractors need to be contacted on a regular basis to give them all the information about the schemes so that there is regular product lifting and secondary sales from the franchise store.  7.   Display:  Responsible for maintaining the planogram & display at the shop for franchise counters by following the SOP given by the franchise team. Product placement & packaging visibility with proper in-shop branding & merchandising is to be ensured.   8.   Meets:  Painter/contractor shop meetings along with TSM/TSE in collaboration with the Franchise dealer to improve the awareness about our new product launches, schemes & special booster schemes.

Should be efficient in converting customer interest into sales. Good negotiation skills. Team Player Quick learner, creative and achiever. column2: Role: Account Executive Experience: 1 - 2+ Years Location: Bangalore Job Description: At Regalix, A MarketStar company, we are on a mission to help some of the world's leading technology companies achieve scale and success by providing them with tech-savvy marketing, customer success, and sales specialists, who partner with our clients to help find solutions to complex business processes. With 2200+ employees spread across 6 countries on 4 continents, we are always on the lookout for smart individuals who believe in constant learning, are unafraid of experimentation, and have an entrepreneurial growth mindset. With our eyes set on the future, we are looking for energetic, outcome-oriented professionals to join our team of experts in Hyderabad. As an Account Executive, will reach out to potential clientele to set up advisory phone calls, and pitch product best practices to promote adoption. Role & Responsibilities:  Grow revenues from SMB clients in your book of business and consistently achieve or exceed quota expectations.  Achieve quarterly client coverage via customer calls and depth of engagement goals.  Achieve quarterly meeting goals for Tier 1 and Tier 2 clients.  Leverage existing and new relationships with current accounts to grow revenue in strategic product areas.  Develop and execute a strategic plan for your book of business leveraging various tools and processes for book segmentation and engagement.  Develop and maintain subject matter expertise on Marketing Solutions offerings.  Educate clients on their opportunities using your digital media expertise and be an expert at translating their marketing goals and objectives into actionable strategies on Marketing Platform.  Provide updates to the management team on your pipeline and sales forecast and Objectives and Key results.  Be proactive about solving problems and be ready to take on additional initiatives and responsibilities as they emerge. Qualification:  1 - 2+ years of work experience in sales, account management or a closely related function  Exceptional written and verbal communication skills  Knowledge of how Internet advertising technology works and the ability to explain it in ordinary terms.  Proven ability to work in a fast-paced dynamic environment.  Proven ability to navigate change, Multitasking & Collaboration  Skilled using Microsoft Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint) or G Suite (Sheets, Docs and Slides).   Preferred Qualifications:  Proven communication skills across multiple channels (e.g., virtual meetings, phone, and email)  Experience building relationships with top marketing decision-makers through calls and emails.  Proven ability in activating and retaining new business.  Proven ability to manage a sizable volume of clients/accounts.  Experience in digital or social media sales.  Experience in marketing or in a role making recommendations to marketers. Why You Should Join:  Impactful Work: You'll have the chance to make a real difference by driving growth for our clients and contributing to the success of our team.  Continuous Growth: We're committed to helping you develop and grow both personally and professionally, with opportunities for advancement and ongoing learning.  Collaborative Environment: You'll be part of a supportive and collaborative team where your ideas are valued, and your contributions are recognized.  Cutting-Edge Industry: Dive into the dynamic world of digital marketing and advertising technology, staying ahead of the curve with the latest trends and innovations.  Competitive Benefits: Enjoy competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and perks designed to support your well-being and success

Having an enviable track record of being the only Indian Dotcom company that has stayed profitable since launch, today IIL investors include Intel Capital and Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd. (Times Group). This position allows you to build new clients for the organization, and build rapport and trust in both yourself and the company. Our sales professionals focus on face-to-face sales presentations as they provide our clients an opportunity to know IndiaMART & value addition IndiaMART can bring to their respective businesses. column2: About Us: We are DoSelect (acquired by Naukri.com), a leading skill assessment platform collaborating with L&D functions to optimize their talent management processes. Role Overview: We are looking for a proactive and results-driven Sales Account Manager/ Account Executive with a deep understanding of the corporate L&D sectors. This role requires technical proficiency to effectively engage with clients and drive revenue growth through strategic partnerships. Responsibilities:  Serve as the primary point of contact for assigned accounts, building strong relationships and identifying opportunities to drive sales growth.  Assess client needs and goals within the corporate L&D sectors, offering tailored solutions to meet their requirements.  Develop and implement sales strategies to leverage our platform for assessment initiatives, focusing on maximizing value for clients.  Utilize technical expertise to showcase the effectiveness of our platform and its integration into client processes, driving adoption and usage.  Analyze sales data and market trends to identify opportunities for revenue growth and strategic expansion.  Collaborate with internal teams to address client needs and ensure smooth execution of sales initiatives.  Provide training and support to clients on the benefits and features of our platform, demonstrating how it can address their business challenges.  Identify upselling and cross-selling opportunities based on client needs and platform capabilities, driving incremental revenue.  Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies to maintain a competitive edge in sales efforts.  Monitor client satisfaction and address any concerns or issues promptly to maintain high levels of engagement and retention.   Requirements:  Bachelor's degree in Engineering/Technology (preferred)  2-3 years of experience in sales/account management, preferably within the corporate L&D sectors.(B2B)  Strong understanding of EdTech and corporate L&D domains, with technical proficiency to effectively engage with clients.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a track record of building rapport and trust with clients.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to leverage data to drive informed sales decisions.  Ability to work independently and collaboratively to achieve sales targets.  Eagerness to learn and adapt to evolving industry trends and technologies. Benefits:  Opportunities for professional growth and development in a dynamic sales environment. If you are passionate about driving sales, possess expertise in account management, and have a deep understanding of corporate L&D sectors, we encourage you to apply.

column2: The    Expansion SAEs    will lead the upsell and cross-sell of enterprise software solutions from    Cloud First Cloud-Native (CFCN)    products to increase incremental subscription revenue from the existing customer instal base.      The    Expansion SAE    is expected to promote Informatica by generating additional revenue and business from existing customers to fuel our growth by right sizing their existing purchases to meet their needs and expanding the departmental use case to an enterprise use case.      This role nurtures and owns the expansion relationship within assigned accounts/territory and maximises Informatica's footprint within them for CFCN products. Incremental Sales revenue will be guided by customers' current consumption of CFCN products guided by the present adoption and their future expansion needs.      Nothing is more paramount to us in    Informatica    than customer success.      The    Expansion SAE    won't simply sell products.      They are expected to analyze the consumption metrics, consult, and listen to understand our needs.      This expansion sale to the existing customer base is backed by collaborative teams.      You collaborate with other teams, including Subscription renewals reps, Sales Account Managers, Customer Success Managers, Customer Success Technologists, marketing, channel management, finance, and customer support, and external parties such as Alliances and Channel Partners.      As its consumption-based expansion role, it needs a thoughtful understanding of Informatica platform technologies and SaaS consumption pricing. Prior enterprise sales experience in the SaaS ecosystem is a must-have experience.      This is a remote sale expand selling position where minimum travel to the customer's location is expected based on customer needs. Travel is up to and may not exceed 10 to 20%, based on our needs.      You will report to the    Chief Customer Officer    organisation through subscription renewals and expansion leadership.        Work Location : Bangalore (Hybrid)        Responsibilities          You will be a quota-carrying expansion or incremental sales position.          Exceed expansion sales goals (quotas) through analysing consumption metrics, prospecting, qualifying, managing, and closing sales opportunities end to end within the assigned accounts/territory.          Expand sales within existing accounts while getting connected and building strategic relationships with main decision-makers.          At this level, incumbents will have expert-level knowledge of selling our CFCN products and services.          Manage customer and transactional information in a Salesforce CPQ CRM system with high accuracy.          Provide regular and accurate reporting of pipeline and forecast through the CRM system.          Accountable for accurate forecasting, regular quarterly revenue delivery, and the implementation of agreed account-level expansion plans.          Provide customer feedback to company partners for product, systems, and process improvements.          Nurture and expand our relationship with customer accounts of several sizes. As it's a consumption-based sale, assigned accounts may be high in volume or larger and of the most complex nature. Hence assigned quota will vary.          Required skills :          Hold expert-level experience and use professional concepts and our goals to resolve complex issues in creative ways.          Deep industry understanding of a customer's decision-making process, goals, strategies, and business objectives.          Expert-level Experience communicating product benefits appropriate for each prospect at all levels of customer engagement.          Knowledge of the enterprise cloud platforms, SaaS, PaaS, and SaaS contracts          Full knowledge of the deployment of software solutions and how consumption metrics promote expansion          Maintain an understanding of Informatica's subscription and Consumption pricing models to provide customers assistance in the usage/use case-based expansion discussions.          Negotiate all facets of renewal contracts, Adoption, and consumption metrics to develop win/win negotiation strategies that maximise contract value while enhancing the customer relationship.          Complete, "big-picture" understanding of the business and technical contexts of main accounts to grow departmental use case sales to enterprise-wide expansion sales.          Adept at consultative effectiveness and establishing trust with internal and external customers.          EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE          5+ years of field sales experience in the SaaS space.          Experience within data management software selling.          A background in success in expanding SaaS subscriptions, demonstrated by overachievement of quota ($1M+ of ARR) and a customer reference          BA/BS or equivalent educational background.          Perks & Benefits          Comprehensive health, vision, and wellness benefits (Paid parental leave, adoption benefits, life insurance, disability insurance and 401k plan or international pension/retirement plans          Flexible time-off policy and hybrid working practices          Tuition reimbursement program to support your and personal growth          Equity opportunities and an employee stock purchase program (ESPP)          Comprehensive Mental Health and Employee Assistance Program (EAP) benefit

column2: Job Description: Business Development Executive/Manager Position Overview:  The Business Development Executive/Manager in a Staffing Company plays a critical role in driving business growth and revenue generation by identifying, pursuing, and securing new client opportunities. This position involves developing and executing strategic plans to expand the company's client base and increase market presence in the Recruitment/Staffing industry. Key Responsibilities: Client Acquisition: Identify potential clients through market research, networking, and cold calling. Build and maintain a robust pipeline of prospective clients. Conduct meetings, presentations, and negotiations with potential clients to understand their staffing needs and position the company's services as a solution. Relationship Management: Develop and nurture strong relationships with key decision-makers within client organizations. Provide excellent customer service and support to existing clients to ensure satisfaction and retention. Act as a trusted advisor to clients, offering insights and recommendations on staffing solutions to meet their business objectives. Proposal Development: Collaborate with internal teams to develop customized staffing solutions tailored to client requirements. Prepare and present proposals, quotations, and contracts to prospective clients. Negotiate terms and conditions of contracts to ensure mutual agreement and satisfaction. Market Intelligence: Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities. Analyze market data and client feedback to identify opportunities for business growth and improvement. Provide regular reports and updates on sales activities, pipeline status, and market insights to management. Sales Strategy: Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve revenue targets and business objectives. Identify new market segments and expansion opportunities to diversify the client portfolio. Continuously evaluate and refine sales tactics and approaches based on market feedback and performance metrics. Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with internal teams, including recruiting, operations, and marketing, to ensure seamless delivery of services to clients. Provide feedback and insights from client interactions to support product/service enhancements and process improvements. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred). Proven track record of success in business development, sales, or account management roles, preferably within the staffing or recruitment industry. Strong understanding of staffing industry dynamics, including recruitment processes, workforce trends, and client needs. Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills. Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients at all levels of an organization. Results-oriented with a focus on achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth. Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple priorities and deadlines effectively. Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office suite. Willingness to travel as needed. The role of a Business Development Executive/Manager in a Staffing Company is dynamic and demanding, requiring a combination of strategic thinking, sales acumen, and relationship-building skills to drive business success in a competitive market.  Freshers can also apply who are willing to develop their career in Business Development / Sales.

column2: About the Company: Spire.AI is an  AI Copilot for Talent  that supports the evolving talent operating model requirements of all Talent stakeholders of future-ready companies that are transforming themselves into Skills-Based Organizations. The Spire.AI full-stack SaaS solutions are powered by one integrated, adaptive, and transparent domain-intelligent Generative Skills AI Platform to  simplify and future-proof the way talent is acquired, deployed, managed, reskilled, grown, and retained. Business Outcomes this Role Delivers: Building of Sales pipeline by cold calling Revenue Generation Key Skills Required:   Prospecting and lead generation, cold calling, email marketing, relationship building, verbal and written communication, active listening, storytelling and articulation, presentation skills, negotiation, persuasion for sales meetings and deal closures Role Responsibilities: We're looking for an experienced inside sales representative to join our dynamic team.  You'll be responsible for identifying new customer leads, qualifying them, and nurturing them through the sales pipeline.  You'll also be responsible for developing and maintaining relationships with key decision-makers. Develop new business through cold calling via telephone and mass communication mediums such as email, and professional networks to introduce company products and services Identify potential clients who need solutions and could buy the products within the target markets assigned Follow up on the leads provided by marketing and research to identify potential prospects Understand the customer's need and appropriately pitch the product solution that caters to customer pain points Demonstrate product and solution value propositions to prospects and set up meetings for sales teams to take forward prospects for sale closure  Identify key buying influencers within the prospect companies to determine the budget and timeline for purchasing decisions Build and cultivate prospect relationships by initiating communications and conducting follow-up communications to move opportunities through the sales funnel Work with sales team to develop and grow the sales pipeline to consistently meet monthly and quarterly revenue goals Prepare and analyze sales pipeline reports and dashboards, ensuring all the reports are accurate and updated Some Important Requirements: Bachelor's degree in business management, sales, marketing, economics, commerce, or a related field 5 to 7 years of proven inside sales experience in an enterprise SaaS product company Experience working in a technology startup or fast-paced technology environment Consistent track record of exceeding inside sales targets and contributing to revenue growth Excellent verbal and written communication, presentation, and negotiation skills Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients at all levels Ability to work independently and as part of a global team located in multiple time zones Passion for HR technology and the future of work
