column2: As an  Automotive & 2W Battery sales Executive (B2B)  , you will be responsible for driving business growth by identifying and pursuing sales opportunities within the business-to-business (B2B) sector. You will play a pivotal role in establishing and maintaining relationships with corporate clients, understanding their needs, and effectively communicating how our products or services can address those needs.  Note - Candidate must have a 2-wheeler/bike/moped for covering Pune/PCMC territory   Key Responsibilities:  1. Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the automotive and two-wheeler battery segment. Develop strategic plans to increase market share and revenue. 2. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, understanding their needs, and providing exceptional service and support. 3. Sales Strategy: Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve targets and objectives. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to capitalize on opportunities. 4. Product Promotion: Educate customers on the features and benefits of our automotive and two-wheeler battery products. Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to highlight key selling points. 5. Sales Forecasting and Reporting: Prepare accurate sales forecasts and reports, monitoring performance against targets. Provide regular updates to management on sales activities, market trends, and competitor insights. 6. Team Collaboration: Collaborate with internal teams such as marketing, distribution, and customer support to ensure seamless execution of sales initiatives and effective resolution of customer issues.   Desired profile of the candidate:   1. Proven experience in sales within the automotive parts or battery industry, preferably with knowledge of automotive and two-wheeler batteries. 2. Strong understanding of sales principles and techniques, with a track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth. 3. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with customers and negotiate effectively. 4. Self-motivated and result-oriented, with a proactive approach to identifying and pursuing business opportunities. 5. Good organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines. Benefits : 1. Performance Incentive  2. Annual Bonus equivalent to 1 month earning (subject to completion of tenure) 3. Petrol Allowance as per company guidelines

We are wanting passionate Tideans to drive innovation and help build a best-in-class platform to support our members. You will be comfortable in ambiguous situations and will be able to navigate the evolving FinTech environment. Imagine shaping how millions of Tide members discover and engage with business banking platforms and building this on a global scale.  What were looking for: As a Member Success Executive (Tele Sales Executive) youll be target oriented and passionate about helping small businesses. Working in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment will excite you along with an interest in the fintech industry and all that we are doing to save small business owners time and money.  Youll be target focused and confident at handling objections to achieve your revenue goals. You??l also have an excellent telephone manner, will be outgoing and thrive working in a close-knit team. You??l possess excellent commercial awareness, constantly seeking new opportunities to generate revenue. Passion, drive and enthusiasm are a must.  Internal Job Title : Member Success Executive As a Member Success Executive you??l be:   You??l be a part of the ??ccount farming??team and will be responsible for nurturing the member relationship post-sale The primary objective of farming team will be to achieve targets related to Tide account activations You??l call our existing members, build rapport with them, understand their businesses and will upsell relevant products or services to help them thrive You??l work cross-functionally with other departments to understand upcoming product launches and ensure that you can pitch these to our members You??l source your own leads that you identify as having potential to generate revenue  You??l get to know these leads/prospective members, and how their businesses plan to operate and will recommend relevant products and services to help them thrive. You??l be entirely comfortable with cold calls, cold emails and cold outreach, and will not need extensive coaching on this.  You??l spend time coaching them through the setup process, and will support wherever needed; giving them a 5 star service as you welcome them to Tide What makes you a great fit:  You are passionate, driven, have a can do attitude and positive! You have excellent written and spoken English and Hindi language skills You have previous customer service or telesales experience You??e focused on revenue and can up-sell to our prospective members You??e target driven You are comfortable with constant change and switching of priorities You love to troubleshoot and have a member first mentality You??e a team player and can complete ad-hoc tasks  You will be incredibly self-motivated and conscientious, wanting to make a real difference to the business You have the ability to be able to listen, learn and adapt to feedback You may also have some knowledge of compliance, KYC, AML, and associated regulations You may also have previous experience working with a Fintech or digital bank Who are Tide: At Tide, we??e on a mission to save businesses time and money. We??e the leading provider of UK SME business accounts and one of the fastest-growing FinTech's in the UK. Using the latest tech, we design solutions with SMEs in mind and our member-driven financial platform is transforming the business banking market. Not only do we offer our members business accounts and related banking services, but also a comprehensive set of highly connected admin tools for businesses. Tide is about doing what you love. We??e looking for someone to join us on our exciting scale up journey and be a part of something special. We are wanting passionate Tideans to drive innovation and help build a best-in-class platform to support our members. You will be comfortable in ambiguous situations and will be able to navigate the evolving FinTech environment. Imagine shaping how millions of Tide members discover and engage with business banking platforms and building this on a global scale.  What you??l get in return:  Competitive salary  Self & Family Health Insurance  Term & Life Insurance  OPD Benefits  Mental wellbeing through Plumm  Learning & Development Budget  15 days of Privilege leaves  12 days of Casual leaves  12 days of Sick leaves  3 paid days off for volunteering or L&D activities  Tide is a place for everyone At Tide, we believe that we can only succeed if we let our differences enrich our culture. Our Tideans come from a variety of backgrounds and experience levels. We consider everyone irrespective of their ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, veteran, neurodiversity status or disability status. We believe it?? what makes us awesome at solving problems! We are One Team and foster a transparent and inclusive environment, where everyone?? voice is heard.

column2: Job Summary: As an MSME Sales Executive at CredAble, you will play a pivotal role in driving market expansion, acquiring new clients, and fostering relationships to grow revenue and ensure client satisfaction. You will be responsible for identifying business opportunities, understanding client needs, and providing tailored funding solutions to MSMEs in the supply chain ecosystem. Key Responsibilities: Identify and prospect supply chain and lending business opportunities in the designated market. Reach out to MSME clients/associates to understand their working capital and funding requirements. Collaborate with intermediaries to generate leads and maintain a steady flow of business opportunities. Source and close deals by presenting appropriate funding solutions to clients. Develop and nurture relationships with MSME owners and other stakeholders. Coordinate with internal teams for approval and disbursal processes. Monitor post-disbursal activities to ensure client satisfaction and ongoing support. Achieve sales targets, increase revenue, profitability, and contribute to business growth. Reporting Line: This position reports directly to the Head of Lending and is integral to driving sales and growth for our platform and lending business. Qualifications and Skills Required: Proven track record in managing successful products or services throughout their lifecycle. Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams in a matrix organization. Strong sales discipline and passion for meeting people to drive business origination. Self-starter with strategic thinking skills to independently pursue opportunities. MBA from a Tier 1 or Tier 2 college with a background in Sales/Marketing preferred. What We Offer: Comprehensive health insurance packages for you and your family. Maternity and paternity benefits including paid leaves and work-from-home options. Access to a cafeteria serving delicious meals. Extended sick leave for health concerns. 30-day paid sabbatical after three years of service. Join Us: If you are passionate about conceptualizing and building products for MSME clients and vendors in the supply chain finance paradigm, we invite you to be part of our visionary team at CredAble. Embrace limitless possibilities and contribute to our mission of making a difference in the world of working capital financing.

column2: About YUBI Yubi, formerly known as CredAvenue, is re-defining global debt markets by freeing the flow of finance between borrowers, lenders, and investors. We are the world's possibility platform for the discovery, investment, fulfillment, and collection of any debt solution. At Yubi, opportunities are plenty and we equip you with tools to seize it. In March 2022, we became India's fastest fin tech and most impactful startup to join the unicorn club with a Series B fundraising round of $137 million. In 2020, we began our journey with a vision of transforming and deepening the global institutional debt market through technology. Our two-sided debt marketplace helps institutional and HNI investors find the widest network of corporate borrowers and debt products on one side and helps corporates to discover investors and access debt capital efficiently on the other side. Switching between platforms is easy, which means investors can lend, invest, and trade bonds - all in one place. All 5 of our platforms shake up the traditional debt ecosystem and offer new ways of digital finance. - Yubi Loans - Term loans and working capital solutions for enterprises. - Yubi Invest - Bond issuance and investments for institutional and retail participants. - Yubi Pool- End-to-end securitisations and portfolio buyouts. - Yubi Flow - A supply chain platform that offers trade financing solutions. - Yubi Co.Lend - For banks and NBFCs for co-lending partnerships. Currently, we have onboarded over 4000+ corporates, 350+ investors and have facilitated debt volumes of over INR 100,000 crore. Backed by marquee investors like Insight Partners, B Capital Group, Dragoneer, Sequoia Capital, LightSpeed and Lightrock, we are the only-of-its-kind debt platform globally, revolutionizing the segment. At Yubi, People are at the core of the business and our most valuable assets. Yubi is constantly growing, with 700+ like-minded individuals today, who are changing the way people perceive debt. We are a fun bunch who are highly motivated and driven to create a purposeful impact. Come, join the club to be a part of our epic growth story. Currently we are looking for  Associate / Sr Associate - Channel Sales Location:  Hyderabad / Gurugram Job Description:   Key Responsibilities Starting sales and developing business in the targeted cluster by establishing and building a customer base in Supply Chain Finance, verticals. Increasing customer base across strategic and opportunistic locations in the region. To maintain good relationships with the anchor's regional & central SPOCs. Evaluate optional plans by identifying outcomes and potential returns. Increasing the share of the SME/MSME wallet  onboarding the customer across multiple products, credit services, etc. Desired Skills and Experience 3-6 years of experience in managing SME / MSME relationships. Flair for Sales Sound understanding of finance & financials? Strong pedigree / academic background Good with numbers, Insights and be able to analyze balance sheets and P&L Extremely self-driven & hardworking with the ability to lead teams Excellent communication skills and man-to-man sales skills. Can work in high-pressure situations and is completely hands-on; has the knack to hustle and get the job done. Having the ability to interact with promoters / CXOs of SMEs and glean information through physical discussions. Flexible to travel around and fluent in English, Hindi, Telugu (for Hyderabad location)

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced sales professional to join our team as a Cloud Services Sales Manager/ Specialist. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in sales of professional managed services in public cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI, etc. This role requires a deep understanding of cloud technologies, excellent sales skills, and the ability to build strong relationships with clients. Job description: Identify and qualify leads for cloud services sales opportunities. Develop and maintain relationships with clients to understand their business needs and propose relevant cloud solutions. Collaborate with technical teams to develop customized proposals and solutions for clients. Drive the sales process from lead generation to closing deals. Meet and exceed sales targets and quotas. Stay updated with industry trends and developments in cloud technologies. Provide feedback to product development teams based on client requirements and market trends. Maintain accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions in CRM software. Sales Skills: Prospect and lead generation. Consultative selling approach. Relationship building and management. Closing deals and negotiation. Sales pipeline management. Customer needs analysis and solution selling. Technical Skills: Knowledge of cloud computing concepts and architectures. Familiarity with public cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI, etc. Understanding of cloud services including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS. Ability to articulate technical solutions to non-technical stake holders. Experience working with CRM software for sales tracking and reporting. Key Qualifications: For consideration, you must bring the following minimum skills and behaviours to our team: 5 to 7 years of experience in sales of professional managed services in public cloud environments. Proven track record of exceeding sales targets and quotas. Strong understanding of cloud technologies and services, including AWS, Azure, GCP, OCI, etc. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Azure Solutions Architect, or Google Cloud Certified Professional are preferred. Bachelors degree in business administration, Sales, or a related field (MBA is a plus)

column2: As a  Sales Manager  in the  Software Services/Consulting  industry, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth through the acquisition of new clients. Your role will involve developing and executing strategic sales plans, managing the sales pipeline, and fostering strong relationships with key stakeholders. You will collaborate closely with internal teams to ensure alignment with business objectives and deliver exceptional value to clients.   Requirements Around  5 to 10 years  of experience in Sales in the Software Services/Consulting Industry Bachelor's degree  in Marketing, Business Administration, Finance or related field. Strong network  of contacts and proven record of success in sales related roles in software services/consulting industry. Should have prior sales experience working with  US/European clients. Experience with sales in software service industry in Investment Management domain would be a plus. Familiarity with understanding of investment products, asset classes, and financial markets is a plus. Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.  Strategic thinker with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Ability to identify market opportunities, assess competitive threats, and develop effective sales strategies. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on driving revenue growth and maximizing profitability. Proven ability to negotiate and close complex sales deals and partnerships. Experience with sales forecasting and reporting tools is desirable.   Responsibilities Sales Strategy:  Develop and implement strategic sales plans to  drive revenue growth and market penetration. Identify target market segments, assess market opportunities, and formulate sales strategies to capitalize on emerging trends and client needs. Client Acquisition:  Identify, prospect, and cultivate relationships with potential clients within the Software Services sector.      Utilize various channels such as networking events, referrals, cold outreach, and industry partnerships to generate leads and opportunities. Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong      relationships with new and existing clients, providing tailored solutions and addressing client inquiries and concerns in a proactive and professional manner. Sales Pipeline Management : Manage the sales pipeline effectively, from lead generation to deal closure. Monitor and track sales activities, opportunities, and progress. Identify bottlenecks and  implement strategies to accelerate the sales cycle. Market Analysis:  Stay informed about industry trends, market      developments, and competitor activities. Conduct market analysis and      research to identify potential clients' needs and preferences, and tailor      sales approaches and offerings accordingly. Collaboration:  Collaborate with internal stakeholders such as      product management, marketing, portfolio management, and client services      teams to ensure alignment of sales efforts with business objectives.      Leverage cross-functional expertise to deliver comprehensive solutions and value to clients. Performance Monitoring:  Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to sales activities, revenue generation, client acquisition, and retention. Provide regular reports and updates to senior      management on sales performance and market trends. Compliance and Risk Management:  Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and company policies related to sales activities, client onboarding, and KYC (Know Your Customer) procedures. Mitigate risks associated with client relationships and sales transactions.   Compensation includes a competitive salary, bonus and commission, commensurate with experience.
column11: New Client Acquisition, Client Relationship Management, Sales Strategy, Sales Development, Sales Management, Sales And Marketing, Sales Growth, Sales Lead Generation, Sales Planning

column2: We are seeking a motivated Senior Sales Engineer to join our dynamic team and drive the execution of our enterprise sales strategy in collaboration with our sales organization. What You ll Do         Act as the primary technical leader and trusted advisor to our enterprise sales team and prospects.     Engage directly with prospects to demonstrate the value of our technology throughout the sales cycle, from demo to proof of concept to design and implementation.     Prepare for and lead technical discussions with various stakeholders, ranging from executive-level business leaders to software engineers.     Consult with prospects to provide technical insight and guidance on the best go-to-market strategies utilizing our products. Comfortable engaging with senior executives in business settings and discussing technical aspects of the product.     Experience working in an Enterprise sales organization, with a knack for providing feedback and insights to improve sales strategies and sales momentum. Previous experience in a Sales Engineering role within the eCommerce or retail industry.     Ability to solve customer-specific business problems and apply Recharge solutions effectively.     Strong customer-facing skills to communicate our vision to technical and executive audiences. Backed by leading global investors, we help companies care better for their employees by providing, About the Role: Having found exceptional product/market fit, were in the midst of transitioning from 'start-up' to scale-up, and are looking for a rockstar Sales Lead to capitalize on the huge demand for our product.  We are looking for passionate entrepreneurs, builders, and straight-up hustlers to help us build something special. column2: About Info Edge India Ltd   Info Edge is Indias leading consumer internet company known for its strong brands in recruitment (naukri.com, naukrigulf.com, iimjobs.com, firstnaukri.com), real estate (99acres.com), matrimony (Jeevansathi.com) and education (shiksha.com). Starting with a classified recruitment online business, naukri.com, the Company has grown and diversified rapidly, setting benchmarks as a pioneer for others to follow either through setting up of in-house brands or through the route of strategic investments and acquisitions. Zomato.com, policybazaar.com & Happily Unmarried Marketing Private Limited are our investee companies to name a few out of many. With years of experience in the domain, strong cash flow generation and a diversified business portfolio, Info Edge is one of the very few profitable pure play internet companies in the country. These are exciting times for Info Edge as we continue to grow in all our businesses, and continue to scale newer heights. We are investing across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to increase our predictive powers on customer behavior and continuously optimize and improve our systems. At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. Driven by innovation, an experienced and talented leadership team and a strong entrepreneurial orientation, we pride ourselves on having a culture that promotes meritocracy. Our numerous milestones can largely be credited to an incredibly smart team working in an environment that encourages creativity and going the extra mile to develop products that people love to use and add value to our clients. About BU: Naukri.com Naukri.com, online recruitment classifieds, is a significant player and a market leader in Indias well-established business space. The recruitment space provides all the job seeker with advisory services and caters to different elements of the job listing, employer branding, resume short-listing, career site management and campus recruitment. With over 67 Million resumes searches daily, Naukri.com has 5 Million job listings, 59 Thousand+ unique clients and 4.9 Million recruiters connect with the job seekers via emails.   The platform, on the online recruitment space, continues to reinforce its established leadership position in India that has given it a competitive edge in the market.  Educational Qualification: Any Postgraduate OR Btech Desired Experience:  0-1 Year Job Objective:  The objective of this role is to enhance our client base by acquiring new business and renewal for our online recruitment solutions. Job Description: New Client Acquisition:  Accelerate customer adoption through well-developed sales engagements and successful Go To Market Strategy Business Renewal : Achieve sales targets by growing business from existing clients through renewal ,upselling and cross selling.  Lead Generation : Develop a database of qualified leads through referrals, digital media, canvassing and cold calling. Client Service & Engagement : Strategizing and implementing recruitment campaigns and actively engaging with the customers by monitoring product delivery, demonstrations and trainings. Closure and Collection : Manage Prospects, negotiate and freeze on commercials taking them to a logical closure with required documentation and ensure timely collection. Consultative Sales Approach : Develop an in depth understanding of the client?? business and their needs and propose customized recruitment solutions. Collaborate with various internal and external teams to deliver the best customer experience, monitor product performance and ROI and share necessary analytics with relevant stakeholders.  Required Skills: Exceptional communication and presentation skills. 0-1 years of corporate sales, B2B experience. Outstanding customer relationship management experience and collaboration skills

column2: Position: Senior Manager-Commercial Business(North) Remote  About  Simplilearn Simplilearn is the world's #1 online Bootcamp for digital economy skills. Our mission as an organization is to help people thrive in the digital economy by empowering them with future-ready skills.  We provide rigorous online programs in disciplines such as Data Science and Analytics, AI and Machine Learning, Big Data Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, Project Management, and Digital Marketing, among others. Our award-winning Bootcamps comprise individual courses, role-based training programs, and comprehensive certification programs designed and offered with world-renowned universities like Wharton, Purdue, Caltech CTME, UMass, IIT Kanpur, top corporations and technology leaders that include the likes of IBM, Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, and globally-recognized industry bodies including PMI, EC-Council, IIBA and more.  Simplilearns key investors include Blackstone and GSV Ventures. We are well positioned as one of the leaders in this space at a global level, with the USA and India being the largest markets.  The growth outlook for Simplilearn is a combination of multi-market organic growth as well as inorganic growth through relevant acquisitions, such as Full Stack Academy, a company we acquired in 2022.  Based in San Francisco, California, and Bangalore, India, we've helped over two million professionals and 2000 corporate training organizations in over 150 countries harness our award-winning programs to achieve their career and business goals.  Roles and responsibilities: This is an Individual Contributor Role based out of Gurgaon for the B2B Sales team of Simplilearn. Responsible for generating profitable revenue from the Enterprise accounts of North. To meet/Exceed the quarterly/Annual Sales target maintain a 5X pipeline and accurately forecast revenue numbers weekly. Actively prospect, qualify, and develop sales pipeline from the list of assigned accounts, Hunt for new accounts and acquire new logos.  Handle inbound leads and take them to closure. Close Opportunities generated by SDRs. Handing over the new customers to the CSM Team for delivery Maintain relationships with existing customers and monitor the delivery closely to gather first-hand feedback on the delivery. Developing and executing a GTM Strategy for the assigned accounts  Keep the data updated on all the sales tools i.e Salesforce CRM                      Build Strong relationships with key client personas through LinkedIn Outreach, personal meetings, and events. Mapping different stakeholders in Enterprise accounts, understanding their pain points, and proposing a solution by leveraging the internal ecosystem of Simplilearn along with the PreSales team leading to customer delight. Maintain Healthy Gross Margin as per the direction of the management.  Desired Skills: 5+ years of Overall Sales experience 3+ Years of acquiring new Enterprise accounts based out of Gurgaon. Experience in selling to C-level executives across different industries Has a consistent record of overachieving Quarterly/Annual Sales targets Has been working as an Individual contributor with >600K annual quota. Has strong relationships with key executives of the enterprise accounts. column2: The Senior Sales Manager for Coworking Space is responsible for driving revenue growth, developing strategic sales plans, and leading a sales team to meet and exceed sales targets. This role requires a seasoned sales professional with a deep understanding of the coworking industry, strong leadership skills, and a proven track record of success in sales. Key Responsibilities: Sales Strategy and Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive sales strategies to achieve revenue goals. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify new business opportunities. Create and execute sales plans, setting measurable targets and timelines. Team Leadership and Development: Lead, mentor, and manage a team of sales professionals to ensure high performance. Provide training and development programs to enhance the skills of the sales team. Conduct regular performance reviews and provide feedback to team members. Client Acquisition and Relationship Management: Identify and pursue new business opportunities to expand the client base. Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, partners, and stakeholders. Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients to secure long-term partnerships. Sales Operations and Reporting: Oversee sales operations, including pipeline management, forecasting, and reporting. Utilize CRM systems to track sales activities, monitor progress, and generate reports. Ensure accurate and timely reporting of sales performance and metrics to senior management. Marketing and Brand Promotion: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and execute promotional campaigns. Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities. Enhance brand visibility and reputation in the coworking space market. Customer Experience and Retention: Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction by addressing client needs and concerns. Develop retention strategies to maintain and grow existing client relationships. Gather and analyze customer feedback to improve service offerings and client experience. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA preferred. Proven experience in a senior sales management role, preferably in the coworking or real estate industry. Strong understanding of the coworking industry and market dynamics. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Demonstrated ability to develop and execute effective sales strategies. Proficiency in CRM software and sales analytics tools. Results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing market conditions. Compensation and Benefits: Competitive salary with performance-based incentives. Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement. Application Process: Interested candidates should submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and qualifications.

column2: About Info Edge India Ltd     Info Edge is Indias leading consumer internet company known for its strong brands in recruitment (naukri.com, naukrigulf.com, iimjobs.com, firstnaukri.com), real estate (99acres.com), matrimony (Jeevansathi.com) and education (shiksha.com).   Starting with a classified recruitment online business, naukri.com, the Company has grown and diversified rapidly, setting benchmarks as a pioneer for others to follow either through setting up of in-house brands or through the route of strategic investments and acquisitions. Zomato.com, policybazaar.com & Happily Unmarried Marketing Private Limited are our investee companies to name a few out of many. With years of experience in the domain, strong cash flow generation and a diversified business portfolio, Info Edge is one of the very few profitable pure play internet companies in the country.   These are exciting times for Info Edge as we continue to grow in all our businesses, and continue to scale newer heights. We are investing across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to increase our predictive powers on customer behavior and continuously optimize and improve our systems.   At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. Driven by innovation, an experienced and talented leadership team and a strong entrepreneurial orientation, we pride ourselves on having a culture that promotes meritocracy. Our numerous milestones can largely be credited to an incredibly smart team working in an environment that encourages creativity and going the extra mile to develop products that people love to use and add value to our clients.   About BU: Naukri.com   Naukri.com, online recruitment classifieds, is a significant player and a market leader in Indias well-established business space. The recruitment space provides all the job seeker with advisory services and caters to different elements of the job listing, employer branding, resume short-listing, career site management and campus recruitment. With over 67 Million resumes searches daily, Naukri.com has 5 Million job listings, 59 Thousand+ unique clients and 4.9 Million recruiters connect with the job seekers via emails.   The platform, on the online recruitment space, continues to reinforce its established leadership position in India that has given it a competitive edge in the market.          Educational Qualification:  MBA in Marketing/International Business Desired Experience: 4 -8 years   Job Objective:  The objective of this role is to enhance our client base by acquiring new business and renewal for our online recruitment solutions.   Job Description:   New Client Acquisition:  Accelerate customer adoption through well-developed sales engagements and successful Go To Market Strategy Business Renewal : Achieve sales targets by growing business from existing clients through renewal ,upselling and cross selling.  Lead Generation : Develop a database of qualified leads through referrals, digital media, canvassing and cold calling. Client Service & Engagement : Strategizing and implementing recruitment campaigns and actively engaging with the customers by monitoring product delivery, demonstrations and trainings. Closure and Collection : Manage Prospects, negotiate and freeze on commercials taking them to a logical closure with required documentation and ensure timely collection. Consultative Sales Approach : Develop an in depth understanding of the clients business and their needs and propose customized recruitment solutions. Collaborate with various internal and external teams to deliver the best customer experience, monitor product performance and ROI and share necessary analytics with relevant stakeholders.    Required Skills:   Exceptional communication and presentation skills. 4-8 years of corporate sales, B2B experience. Outstanding customer relationship management experience and collaboration skills   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

column1: Sales And Service Engineer - ( Vadodara, Bharuch & Vapi )
column2: We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented  Sales and Service Engineer  specializing in  industrial pumps  to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving sales of our industrial pump products and providing exceptional technical support and service to our customers. This role requires a strong understanding of industrial pump systems, excellent communication skills, and a proactive approach to meeting sales targets and customer needs. Key Responsibilities: 1. Sales and Business Development:    - Identify and pursue sales opportunities for industrial pump products within assigned territories or customer segments.    - Develop and maintain relationships with key customers, including industrial manufacturers, plant operators, and engineering firms.    - Collaborate with the sales team to develop sales strategies, forecasts, and budgets.    - Prepare and present sales proposals, quotations, and product demonstrations to customers.    - Negotiate contracts and terms of sale to achieve profitable outcomes. 2. Technical Support and Service:    - Provide technical assistance and support to customers regarding pump selection, installation, operation, and maintenance.    - Conduct site visits to assess customer needs, troubleshoot issues, and recommend solutions.    - Coordinate with internal teams, including engineering and manufacturing, to address customer inquiries and resolve technical issues promptly.    - Deliver training sessions and workshops for customers on pump operation, maintenance best practices, and safety guidelines.    - Maintain accurate records of service activities, customer interactions, and equipment specifications. 3. Market Analysis and Product Feedback:    - Stay informed about market trends, competitor activities, and industry regulations related to industrial pumps.    - Gather feedback from customers regarding product performance, features, and enhancements.    - Analyze sales data and customer feedback to identify opportunities for product improvements or new product development initiatives. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field. - Proven experience in sales and technical support roles within the industrial pump industry. - Strong understanding of various types of industrial pumps, including centrifugal pumps, positive displacement pumps, and specialized pump systems. - Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to convey technical information clearly and persuasively. - Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with customers and internal stakeholders. - Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office applications. - Willingness to travel extensively to customer sites within assigned territories.

column2: Job Description: Sales Executive & Manager - Golf Cart and Electric Three-Wheeler Location: Punjab, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, Chhattisgarh  Office Location: Gurugram Position Summary: We are seeking dynamic and results-driven Sales Executives & Managers to join our team for the sales of Golf Carts and Electric Three-Wheelers across the regions of Punjab, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, and Chhattisgarh. The ideal candidates will have a passion for sales and a deep understanding of the electric vehicle market. Both experienced professionals and freshers are encouraged to apply. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve sales targets in the designated regions. - Identify and engage potential clients, including businesses, golf courses, and individual buyers. - Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions. - Conduct market research to stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities. - Identify and appoint dealers for retail sales in the designated regions. - Organize and participate in promotional events and trade shows to increase brand awareness. - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop effective sales materials and campaigns. - Prepare and deliver sales presentations and proposals to potential clients. - Negotiate sales contracts and agreements, ensuring profitability and customer satisfaction. - Provide after-sales support and ensure high levels of customer satisfaction. column2: Do you want to be part of an Organisation that is steering the Data Protection & Cyber Resilience market? You will get to shine in the most exciting entrepreneurial time in the industry. We at Commvault, envision an environment where hard-working personalities come together to collaborate and build what can be and take their careers places, they simply couldnt anywhere else. We are recognised as a leading platform for Data Protection, backup and recovery in the cloud, hybrid or any infrastructure, helping companies transform their data into a powerful strategic asset. Our data protection and information management solutions enable companies and organizations of all sizes, in all industries, to protect, access and share all their data- anywhere and anytime. As a company, we are at a critical point and are in a great position to expand our market share and we are looking for front-runners that have a challenger mentality, are fluent in sales-management and chip in magnificently to solving customer pains across different scenarios. We are committed to a great work culture that embraces our values and promotes professional growth. Our vaulters are hard-working innovators, who work together to uncover new challenges and drive our customers business forward. Were all about getting the job done and having FUN doing it. As vaulters, we pride ourselves on visibility, integrity, and respect in everything that we do. There has not been a better time to join a growing company with such strong roots, where you can take on your new challenge. Today we have an outstanding career opportunity for an Enterprise Account Executive (EAE) for handling our business in  Public Sector. The person will be responsible for achieving the organisational priorities into a defined account list that may include current Commvault customers and high-value prospects. The position is a field sales role where the EAE will engage in face-to-face sales with customers and prospects either directly or through partners. The Enterprise Account Manager plans, organizes, leads, and controls balanced sales growth, account penetration and customer satisfaction on a long-term multi-quarter basis. This individual may lead a cross-functional sales team and is responsible for creating sales campaigns to penetrate/expand their target accounts. The EAE must have the ability to articulate an in-depth understanding of the customers environment, current challenges/goals and have the ability to align Commvault solutions to those challenges/goals including a financial and strategic value proposition. The candidate must have a history of success in selling complex software platforms (vs. IT component or narrow focused tools) and should have some level of prior engagement with the target account set. Position Responsibilities Achieve quarterly and annual quotas by selling to new and established large, complex prospects and customer. Develop and implement Strategic account plans for target account expansion and new account acquisition including performance objectives, financial targets, and critical breakthroughs for a one and three-year period. Create sale campaigns into target accounts and closely coordinate company executive involvement with customer/prospect leadership. Coordinate the involvement of company personnel, including support, service, and management resources, to meet account performance objectives and customers expectations. Handle a matrixed sales team; liaison with clients, Deal Desk, inside sales, partners, channels, sales engineers, professional services, finance and legal to drive a prospect to close Establish and maintain a productive, professional relationship with key personnel in assigned customer/prospect accounts. Construct and deliver tangible cases at the customer leadership level including financial (ROI & TCO), technical and strategic value propositions Prepare and present sales proposals and presentations to new and existing clients Identify and build strategic collaborations and alliances that have existing relationships with the assigned target accounts Negotiate and close deals following the companys practices and processes Ensure orders meet all legal and financial requirements Maintain a high level of relevant industry, Commvault and driven knowledge Plan, attend and coordinate executive briefings Leverage internal sales tools and processes to drive opportunities to a successful close. Position Requirements Bachelors degree or equivalent experience and validated sales experience of at least 7+ years of Field Sales Experience in Public Sector ( esp State Gov. Central Gov & PSUs). Demonstrable success in software sales at the enterprise level; selling six-and-seven figure deals and handling an integrated selling team Experience in selling Security, Data Protection, Cloud Sales, Storage solutions is preferred. Deep understanding of Cyber Security, Data Protection, Cloud Sales, Storage management or data management industry, products, competitors, history, emerging trends and changing marketplace. Ability to interact and communicate with individuals at all levels of the organization. Excellent communication skills, persuasive, and listening skills. Background in IT infrastructure; Software Solution Sales, SaaS Experience will be preferred.

column2: Title:  SaaS Sales Manager (US)  Location:  Banjara Hills, Hyderabad (on-site) Shift/Timings:  Night Shift/ (7:00 PM - 4:00 AM IST) We are seeking an experienced and driven SaaS Sales Manager to spearhead our sales efforts and drive revenue growth. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in selling SaaS solutions, with a strong focus on lead generation, cold calling, product demonstrations, and data mining.   Responsibilities:   - Develop and execute a comprehensive sales strategy to achieve targeted revenue goals and expand our customer base. - Manage the full sales cycle, from lead generation and prospecting to closing deals and account management. - Conduct effective cold calls and product demonstrations to showcase the value proposition of our SaaS offerings. - Leverage data mining techniques to identify and target potential customers and opportunities. - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement lead generation campaigns and sales enablement materials. - Utilize CRM tools (e.g., ZoomInfo, Zoho CRM, LinkedIn Sales Navigator) to manage leads, track sales activities, and forecast sales pipeline. - Provide coaching, training, and mentorship to the sales team to enhance their skills and performance. - Analyze sales data and metrics to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. - Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competition, and customer needs to refine our sales approach.   Qualifications:   - Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (preferred). - Minimum of 5 years of experience in SaaS sales, with a proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. - Expertise in lead generation, cold calling, product demonstrations, and data mining techniques. - Proficient in using CRM tools (e.g., ZoomInfo, Zoho CRM, LinkedIn Sales Navigator) and sales automation software. - Experience in both B2B and B2C SaaS sales environments. - Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation skills. - Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and metrics. - Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities. - Passion for technology and a deep understanding of SaaS business models.   We offer a competitive compensation package, including a base salary, commission structure, and comprehensive benefits. If you are a driven sales professional with a proven track record in SaaS sales, we would love to hear from you. Thanks, Miskeen Ahmed HR & Operations Associate 6160 Warren Pkwy, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034 Phone: : +91 8978929019 Email : miskeen@cintap.com | Fax : 877-383-6119 www.cintap.com

column2: Digital Solution Advisor Job Description The Digital Solution Advisor is a part of the front-end sales/ account management team at HighRadius and works closely with the Account Executive (AE) in day-to-day interactions with the prospect/ customer. The Digital Solution Advisor will carry a Sales quota target and the primary responsibility is to move deals through the sales pipeline across the various sales stages to closure and also customer satisfaction (NPS 50)/renewals/minimize churn.? Job?Summary:   HighRadius End-to-End Sales and Customer Management Process HighRadius follows a Two-in-a-Box??model where Digital Solution Advisor and an Account Executive (AE) are involved in every interaction with a prospect/ customer. The different stages of such a process usually include: ??Initial connect and prospecting ??Understanding prospect business needs and requirements? ??Creating and demonstrating value of HighRadius products to prospects using Business Cases/ ROI models ??Aligning with various stakeholders in the prospect?? organization ??Preparing and reviewing contracts ??Renewal of contracts ??Proactive churn risk management ??Escalation Management ??Negotiation and closing the deal/ opportunity Responsibilities ??Work along with the AE to move deals/ opportunities through the pipeline. ??Interact with the prospect/ customer on a day-to-day basis. ??Requirement gathering and Customer qualification via a systematic analysis of customer business. ??Product demonstration to Finance department of Fortune 1,000 companies (CXO, VP, Director Level audience). ??Develop a detailed Cost Benefit ROI/ Business Case model. ??Strategize/ develop a plan to take on the competition and take deals/ opportunities to successful closure. ??Churn management - maximize customer satisfaction ??Analyze customer tickets and coordinate with respective departments (support, product, etc.) to be sure we are closing tickets and ensuring high customer satisfaction ??Negotiate and close renewals ??Proactively manage customers to minimize churn Requirements ??Prior Sales/Business Development/Pre-Sales/ Consulting experience/ Customer Success ??Hands-on working experience with ERP software?? and/or cloud computing knowledge is an advantage ??3-10 Years of experience is preferred? ??MBA and undergrad from reputed institutions is an advantage ??Experience in working with North American or European customers in a consultative sales role would be an advantage ??Prior Accounts Receivable knowledge would be an advantage Soft Skills ??Highly Organized and Self Motivated ??Possesses excellent communication and presentation skills ??Comfortable interacting with CXO level employees of Fortune 1,000 companies ??Excellent at teamwork and ability to work in a distributed delivery environment ??Possesses and demonstrates high integrity and credibility as perceived by all those with whom they will work ??Strong intellect coupled with proficient commercial instincts ??Unwavering focus on results/target?

column2: Company Name - Unixpro Robogate Pvt. Ltd https://unixprorobogate.com/ Job Role - International Sales Executive Key Responsibilities & Duties of International sales Lead  1. Qualify Leads - Engage with prospects to gather information and assess their needs and interest in the product or service. - Qualify leads based on predetermined criteria, such as budget, timeline, and decision-making authority. - Identify and prioritize high-potential leads for further follow-up or conversion. 2. Generate Sales Opportunities - Identify sales opportunities and schedule appointments or demonstrations for the sales team. - Overcome objections and address concerns raised by prospects to move them through the sales process. - Close sales or obtain commitments for further action, such as sending more information or arranging follow-up calls. 3. Follow-Up and Relationship Building - Follow up with prospects who have expressed interest but have not yet made a purchase decision. - Build rapport with prospects and establish trust through effective communication and relationship-building techniques. - Provide ongoing support and assistance to prospects throughout the sales cycle to facilitate conversion. 4. Provide Product Information - Provide accurate and detailed information about products or services to prospects. - Answer questions and address inquiries about product features, pricing, and availability. - Customize product presentations or demonstrations to meet the specific needs and preferences of each prospect. 5. Maintain Call Records and Documentation - Document all calls, interactions, and outcomes in CRM (Customer Relationship Management) software or databases. - Keep detailed records of prospect information, including contact details, preferences, and purchase history. - Update records regularly to ensure accuracy and completeness of data. 6. Adhere to Compliance Guidelines - Ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations, such as Do Not Call (DNC) lists and telemarketing regulations. - Adhere to company policies and guidelines for ethical and responsible telemarketing practices. - Respect prospect preferences and privacy rights, including opting out of future communications. 7. Collaborate with Sales Team - Coordinate with the sales team to share information about qualified leads and scheduled appointments. - Provide feedback and insights from prospect interactions to help refine sales strategies and messaging. - Collaborate with sales colleagues to achieve team goals and objectives. 8. Continuous Learning and Improvement - Participate in training sessions and skill development programs to enhance telemarketing techniques and sales skills. - Seek feedback from supervisors and peers to identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions. - Stay updated on product knowledge, industry trends, and best practices in telemarketing and sales.

column2: Title:  GCCs & Large Enterprises Analytics Sales Manager Full-time/Part-time:  Full-time Location:  Gurgaon/Mumbai/Bangalore   About TransOrg Analytics TransOrg Analytics, an award winning Big Data and Predictive analytics company, offers advanced analytics solutions and services to industry leaders and Fortune 500 companies across India, North America, APAC, and the Middle East. Visit www.transorg.com for details.   You are expected to independently identify, connect with, qualify, and close deals with   prospective GCCs (Global Captive Centers), large corporates, enterprise clients across top industries including banking, financial services, insurance, hospitality, CPG, retail, ecommerce, aviation, and other sectors in India requiring frequent travel. This will include building business with both India-operating teams and their GCC (global back offices of data science/analytics) situated in India of such clients.   Evaluation process will include: Interview rounds with   Transorgs HR, sales, and CEO Mock case study / sales pitch on an assigned case study that you are expected to solve and present your sales pitch which will include a PowerPoint presentation   At TransOrg you will be collaborating with the in-house sales and marketing team based in India along with vertical heads/technical SMEs in in selling our advanced analytics solutions to top decision makers (CXOs, HODs, VPs, SVPs, Directors etc.) of target companies in one or more of our target industries such as banking, financial services, insurance (BFSI), consumer products, hospitality, aviation, telecom and across key functions such as customer acquisition, customer engagement (cross-sell, up-sell, CTLV), customer success, retention, fraud, risks, underwriting, collections, marketing, operations, strategy, sales, revenues, demand forecasting, trade promotion optimization. Our range of services and solutions span across advanced analytics, machine learning, data science, big data engineering, big data analytics, artificial intelligence, generative AI, adversarial AI, and BI/dashboards.    We are looking for an enterprising, energetic, and independent sales professional specializing in consultative selling and solution selling in data science, advanced analytics, ML and AI services to India-based   large corporate client accounts (to both India-focused teams & GCCs/global back offices).   You will work independently and with the business development team in generating qualified leads of large-scale   big-ticket sales opportunities in top corporates and enterprises in India. You will own end-to-end   sales funnel from lead generation to closure of your own leads and sales opportunities. studies, white papers, demos etc.   Identify and participate in networking events, conferences, webinars etc. in India for sales pipeline building, relationship nurturing with target contacts and competitive landscaping    Skills and expertise  At least 8 years of experience in sourcing and closing sales to GCCs, large enterprise, and corporate B2B ??ata science and analytics services??deals in India is a must   Demonstrated experience in sales qualification of analytics services leads and winning large deals in this space   Able to understand prospective customer needs and find a solution. ??ustomer First??approach and an ability to make a positive impact on every interaction, able to understand prospective customer needs and propose relevant solution   Able to anchor and lead all prospective clients??calls and meetings to showcase and deliver presentations, sales pitches, solution demonstrations, proposals & RFP/RFI responses   Interpersonal effectiveness and ability to influence; use data, insights from your own research, client interaction and logic to convince others, articulate with conviction   BTech/BSc with an MBA in marketing and/or strategy preferred   Possess business maturity and top-level fundamental understanding of: Advanced analytics, data science, machine learning, AI, generative AI Indian BFSI, CPG, retail, ecommerce, aviation, telecom, column2: We manage enterprise travel and sell services for hotel reservations, air ticketing, rail reservation, bus reservation. We only offer services to enterprise for FIT travel. We are not into MICE offerings. We are looking to expand and grow by developing a network of individuals from sales background - who are working for hotels / MICE companies and willing to works as freelancers. The most suitable candidates would who are currently working in a hotel at unit level / regional sales office level. With no conflict of interest. The preferred candidate would be from room sales, banquet sales, event sales, catering sales, revenue management.   The second best candidate would be someone already working in the travel department of the corporate and become our ambassador / refer us internally.     What we look from the candidate Refer us to a client / introduce us to a client Share leads in the form of emails / contact person / coordinate details  Speak about us and the service we offer to the client - introduce our services to the client - get us connected over a joint email / call / virtual meeting  We pay you 20% of your current in-hand salary as fixed cost + incentives with - No target on sales / revenue  We pay you 50% of your current in-hand salary as fixed cost + incentives - if you are willing to take a target We intend to create a win win situation where we enjoy the benefits of your network and pay you a fee. Which would not hurt your current job / your current employer. What we offer to clients is Pure Agency Travel Reservation Services - Domestic hotel reservation PAN India with Client GST no. For international hotels - the client can also choose the source - OTA (expedia, makemytrip, booking.com, hotels.com etc) or hotels website to book from and we will book. Client choice to opt for product specific source - domestic hotels from MMT, International hotels from Expedia, flights from Yatra we will do it For each request client raises we will send you quotes with screen shot from preferred source as indicated by you Our invoice will be COST (as reimbursement value) + service fee and GST on service fee Our invoices will be submitted along with original purchase voucher from the same source 30 day credit period on all services availed

column2: The Sales Executive is responsible for generating new business, managing existing customer relationships, and driving revenue growth through effective sales strategies. This role requires a strong technical background in mechanical engineering, combined with excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 1. New Business Development: - Identify and pursue new sales opportunities within the assigned territory. - Conduct market research to understand industry trends and customer needs. - Develop and maintain a pipeline of potential customers through cold calling, networking and lead generation activities. - Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and product demonstrations to prospective clients. - Participating in trade fares & exhibitions. 2. Customer Relationship Management: - Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers. - Regularly visit customer sites to understand their needs and provide technical support. - Identify opportunities for Collaborating with customers with regard to any development needs of the customer. - Ensure customer satisfaction by addressing complaints and concerns promptly and effectively. - Handling Customer Complaints and ensuring timely closure. - Co-ordinating with Logistic department and ensuring on time delivery to customers.  - Maintaining and enhancing cordial relationship with customer, their plant personnel at every level. - Arranging for technical meet between the customer and the company. - Payment Collection 3. Sales and Forecasting: - Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets. - Accurately forecast sales and provide regular updates to management. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing and product development, to align sales efforts. - Pre Sales efforts for completing the marketing process and finalizing the order. 4. Technical Support: - Leverage engineering expertise to provide technical advice and solutions to customers. - Assist customers in configurations based on their specific requirements. - Conduct product demonstrations and training sessions for customers as needed. 5. Reporting and Administration: - Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of customer interactions, sales activities, and forecasts in the company's CRM system. - Prepare and submit sales reports, expense reports, and other administrative documents as required. Qualifications and Requirements: Education and Experience: - Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field from a recognized university. - Minimum of 3-7 years of relevant experience in sales in the manufacturing or industrial sector. - Strong experience in sales of manufactured & Engineering products to B2B market.  Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. - Ability to build and maintain strong customer relationships. - Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. - Proficiency in using MS office with expertise in Excel and power point presentations. - Experience in working in a SAP environment is desirable. - Self-motivated and driven to achieve sales targets. - Strong time management and organizational skills. - Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned territory.

column1: NPST Relationship Manager For NPCI | Mumbai
column2: About the Job   Who we are and what do we do   ?Innovation in every byte  NPST is a fintech company bridging the banking and fintech worlds with its product suite of technology and payments, for over 10 years. We provide software and digital payment solutions to the BFSI Industry as a Technology service provider. We function as a Technology Service Provider (TSP) and a Third-Party Aggregator Provider (TPAP), catering to stakeholders across the financial value chain, including banks, merchant aggregators, merchants, and consumers.??  We got listed targeting SME IPO in Aug  2021 on the NSE Emerge platform with a market cap of 2000 Cr (as of Mar24) and became NPCI- an approved Merchant Payment Service Provider, acquiring merchants and facilitating payment. NPST has a marquee clientele having 10 Banks and 30+ PAPG and Merchants.  We believe, Technology drives generations making lives simpler and efficient and aim to change lives and build financially inclusive societies.  What will you do   We are looking for an experienced relationship manager, who is passionate about enhancing our relationship with NPCI by coordinating with internal stake holders and the NPCI team.?  This role brings up the stakeholder management by quick coordination and timely escalation with the right stake holders for solving their issues.  Detail Job Summary:?   As a Relationship Manager for a NPCI and NPST, Candidate will be responsible for fostering positive relationships between the NPCI and the NPST it oversees. The role involves understanding the needs and concerns of both parties, facilitating communication, and ensuring compliance with regulations while maintaining a cooperative environment. This position requires strong interpersonal skills, regulatory knowledge, and the ability to navigate complex relationships.  Job Responsibilities:  Cultivate strong relationships with key stakeholders within the NPST and NPCI under its purview.?  Serve as the primary point of contact for inquiries, concerns, and feedback from both parties.?  Establish trust and credibility through effective communication and responsiveness.?  Facilitate communication channels between the NPST and NPCI to ensure clarity on new regulations, guidelines, and compliance requirements.?  Organize meetings, workshops, and forums to improve the collaboration between stakeholders.?  Communicate changes in regulations or policies effectively and ensure understanding among all parties involved.?  Conduct periodic reviews and assessments to ensure on adhering to regulatory standards.?  Provide guidance and support to organizations to address and compliance issues or concerns.?  Engage with all the stakeholders from different teams and to get the updates w.r.t ongoing projects.?  Timely escalating to the right team to address the issue and to drive the discussion for issue resolution.  What are we looking for:   At least 5 years of experience in relationship management, stakeholder management.?  Having good knowledge of the banking and payment domain and NPCI Product suite.?  Excellent analytical skills and can analyses the situation and to connect with the right team.?  Ability to build and maintain positive relationships with clients, demonstrate empathy and manage conflicts effectively.?  Bachelor's /masters degree in a relevant field such as business administration.?  Proven experience in regulatory affairs, compliance, or relationship management roles.?  Strong understanding of regulatory frameworks and compliance requirements within the relevant industry or sector.?  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence stakeholders at all levels.?  Conflict resolution and negotiation skills, with a diplomatic approach to resolving issues.  Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.?  Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and industry best practices.?  Willingness to travel to client meetings and conferences when required.?  Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software applications.  Experience - Total Experience: 5 to 8 years,?  Industry- BFSI/ Banking /Fintech  Work arrangement ??5 days working from office  Location ??Mumbai

column2: As an ERP Sales Consultant, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth by actively promoting and selling our ERP solutions to potential clients. You will leverage your knowledge of ERP systems, industry expertise, and exceptional sales skills to identify and engage with key decision-makers within target organizations. Your primary objective will be to understand the unique business needs of prospective clients, demonstrate how our ERP solutions can address those needs, and close sales opportunities.             Responsibilities:           Identify and Prospect:         Conduct thorough market research to identify potential customers and target industries.     Utilize various channels (e.g., networking, cold calling, referrals) to generate a steady pipeline of qualified leads.     Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders.           Consultative Selling:         Understand prospective clients business challenges and requirements, and effectively communicate how our ERP solutions can address their specific needs.     Conduct product demonstrations and deliver compelling presentations to showcase the value and benefits of our ERP offerings.     Collaborate with internal teams, including pre-sales engineers and consultants, to provide accurate and comprehensive solutions to prospective clients.           Sales Cycle Management:         Qualify leads and opportunities based on established criteria and prioritize efforts accordingly.     Develop and deliver persuasive sales proposals and negotiate contract terms.     Manage the end-to-end sales cycle, including lead generation, needs assessment, solution design, contract negotiation, and closing deals.           Relationship Building:         Cultivate and maintain long-term relationships with clients to drive customer satisfaction and loyalty.     Stay updated on industry trends, competitive landscape, and emerging technologies to effectively position our ERP solutions in the market.     Participate in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to promote our company and expand professional networks.           Qualifications:         Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.     Proven track record of success in ERP or enterprise software sales, with a minimum of 2 years of experience.     Strong knowledge of ERP systems, including functionality, implementation processes, and industry best practices.     Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner.     Demonstrated ability to build rapport, negotiate effectively, and close sales opportunities.     Self-motivated and target-driven, with a passion for exceeding sales goals.     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to understand client requirements and propose tailored solutions.     Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.     Willingness to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events.
column11: Cold calling, Lead generation, ERP, Networking, Relationship building, Sales lead generation, Market research, HTML, ERP sales

column2: Job Title: Assistant Sales Manager Company:  Jasper Towers LLP Location:  Guwahati (Assam) Job Type:  Full-time Job Description: Jasper Towers LLP is seeking a motivated and results-driven Sales Professional to join our team. The candidate will be responsible for promoting and selling our products by engaging with dealers to secure orders, visiting sites for product sampling, and ensuring timely payments. This role involves extensive traveling within the designated region. Responsibilities: Conduct on-site product sampling to showcase the quality and benefits of our products. Build and maintain strong relationships with dealers, persuading them to place orders and ensure timely deliveries. Actively seek out new sales opportunities and expand the customer base within the assigned territory. Provide excellent customer service, addressing any inquiries or concerns promptly and professionally. Meet and exceed sales targets by effectively implementing sales strategies and techniques. Keep abreast of market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including sales forecasts, activity logs, and expense reports. Collaborate with the sales team and other departments to optimize sales efforts and enhance customer satisfaction. Represent the company at trade shows, exhibitions, and other industry events as required. Requirements: Minimum 3 years experience in sales and marketing, preferably in the cement industry. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build rapport and negotiate effectively. Excellent organizational and time management abilities, capable of managing a busy schedule and meeting deadlines. Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned territory. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a drive to achieve and exceed sales targets. Valid driver's license and clean driving record. Bachelor's degree in Commerce, Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field is preferred. Benefits: Competitive salary with incentives based on sales performance. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within the company. Training and professional development programs to enhance skills and knowledge. Jasper Towers LLP is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage applications from all qualified individuals, regardless of race, gender, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, or nationality.

column2: Role & responsibilities   We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Executive/ Manager to join our team at Stellar Gymkhana Club.  The primary responsibility of this role is to handle sales and drive new business development initiatives for our esteemed club.    Key Responsibilities:   Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and drive business growth. Identify and pursue new business opportunities through proactive outreach, networking, and relationship building. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions. Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and potential areas for expansion. Develop promotional campaigns and initiatives to attract new members. Prepare and present sales proposals, contracts, and presentations to clients. Provide excellent customer service and support to ensure client satisfaction and retention. Monitor and analyze sales performance metrics, identifying areas for improvement and implementing corrective actions as necessary. Stay updated on industry trends, market dynamics, and best practices in sales and hospitality. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or related field. Proven track record of 2-5 years of experience in sales within the hospitality industry, preferably in a club or leisure facility. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to articulate ideas and persuade others effectively. Strong negotiation and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a drive to exceed targets and deliver exceptional results. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and CRM software. Must possess own conveyance for travel as required. Perks and benefits     Competitive salary package  Opportunity for career growth and advancement within a prestigious leisure club.

column2: The position holder is primarily responsible for revenue generation through acquisition of new customers and strategic alliances with existing customers.     The Sales Executive / Assistant Sales Manager will identify opportunities to increase sales and profitability, and has responsibilities directly related to making sales to include: meeting with customers at the customer s place, communicating with customers via phone, email, and teleconference     providing subject matter expertise regarding technical issues; advising customers on suitability of products and solutions based on their technical/financial needs, preparing proposals, presentations, pricing and contracts, developing strategic plans related to the customer and the proposed solution.           Principle Accountabilities         Contact businesses within the telSpiel service territory, perform needs analysis and provide a detailed solution to these customers.     Stay current with changes and developments in the communications industry. This includes gathering competitive information on products and services, and sharing this information with the product development, marketing, customer service, and executive teams.     Responsible for the initial integration/configuration of all regulated and deregulated solutions and services, which may require written proposals or product demonstrations.     Manage complex contract negotiations and work with legal counsel as required.     Champion client s agreement to purchase through order, design, and implementation phases. During this process the Enterprise Sales Executive will interface with, and as needed, give direction to other departments within telSpiel to ensure customer satisfaction with services provided.     Develop trusted partner relationships with all customers to retain and grow revenues over time.         Additional Responsibilities         Assist with marketing strategy and sales support.     Maintain ongoing customer relationships with travel to our serving areas as required.     Continually evaluate business processes and recommend improvements.     Participate in revenue budget forecasting and ongoing budget variance reporting.         Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities         Working knowledge of the enterprise/corporate customers. Preferably in sales department. This applies for Assistant Manager.      Must have exceptional communications skills (both verbal and written) and a strong drive to help customers with creative solutions.     Strong listening and analytical skills are required to determine customer needs and requests.     Strong presentation skills are required, both in person and via teleconference or video conference.     Ability to make sound decisions with the information at hand, with the end goal of customer satisfaction and positive revenue generation.     Well organized, with attention to detail.     Excellent organizational skills allowing to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.     Valid ID Address Proof.         Education and Experience Required         Full time master s degree in business administration, or similar diploma or degree courses.     Freshers can apply for Sales Executive position.         For Assistant Manager Sales following shall be applicable:         1+ years of experience in sales, marketing, business development or related experience in enterprise business, corporate sales or key account management in any industry.     Background of revenue growth in related position within the industry or similar industry.     Slight understanding of telecommunication, Digital Marketing or Mobile Marketing terms.

column2: Job Title:  Assistance Manager / Manager Mid Corporate - Business Relationship Manager  Company Profile: It is India's Most Respected rating agency committed to providing the India's credit markets with accurate, timely and prospective credit opinions. Built on a foundation of independent thinking, rigorous  analytics, and an open & balanced approach towards credit research, has grown rapidly during the past decade  gaining significant market presence in India's fixed income market.   Reporting Lines    Associate Director / Director     Key Objectives      Responsible for developing and executing target driven marketing strategy for the Mid Corporate-BRM Group  for businesses     Raising the profile of the brand through consistent marketing to bankers, investors, sponsors and  infrastructure funds.    Management of existing issuer relationships and origination of new issuer/product mandates.  ??In charge of fee negotiations for both existing and new mandates.    Working closely with the analytical teams.     From the outset the individual will enjoy a high degree of autonomy and responsibility, with excellent  opportunities for self and career development. The role involves travel.   ??Understanding of debt capital markets as well as a general understanding of corporate credit analysis.   Technical Skills & Experience     The work primarily involves:    Experience in selling financial services to Mid-sized corporates.    Preparation of target clients list. This will include both new clients as well as existing clients for new products or  products for which is being used by clients. The parameters for selection of clients  would require a base case study of the profile including financials of the target clients.    Preparation of Marketing Material. Clients from different industries need different type of inputs on different  sectors ranging from manufacturing to metals to banking.     High Level Client Interaction: Typically the business development interaction is at CFO or CEO level. Hence,  the person is required to be well read, intelligent, well mannered, polished and spontaneous. Ability to hold the  attention of the senior management personnel and engaging in a meaningful discussion is key job element. Depending on the choice and inclination of the client, sending them appropriate research reports from across the global site will be an integral part of the job.    Network Interaction: This shall be an integral component of profile to interact with various people within the network. Interaction with the business development vertical as well as product verticals is very important. This  shall be an ongoing initiative.    MIS and Reporting: Since the team is small, MIS and other information reporting shall primarily be driven out  of the BD function. The profile requires maintaining an up-to-date meeting minutes, mandates won, fees received  etc. The function does have a centralized support for tertiary activities.   Qualifications / Prerequisite     ??Require 3-5 years of Business Development Experience. Experience in selling financial services to Mid-sized  corporates   ??Well networked  ??Should know the local language (optional)       Behavioral Skills  Knowledge and Expertise: Strong marketing, negotiation skills are a pre-requisite.      Knowledge Application and Problem Solving:     Management: The function is quite challenging. It requires high self-drive and motivation with persistence to achieve high targets.      Communication: Excellent communication skills and should be able to communicate at senior management level.  Good  interpersonal skills.      Quality Service: Ability to manage own time in the most optimal manner      Self-starter with strong focus on revenue generation.
